Flexible working hours and remote work culture 5. Notebook Ownership Program 6. Friendly and dynamic work environment 7. description: Roles & Responsibilities Deliver user experiences focusing on supply-chain and logistics people Partner with CEO, business development team and engineers to design effective and efficient software solutions Conduct user research to derive insights, craft personas, and map client / user journeys across the product portfolio Conduct concept and usability testing to iteratively validate and improve solution design Create and refine wireframes, static mock-ups and visual design Work with Product and Technology leadership to ensure the design solutions map to a larger strategy while working in a faced paced agile environment Advocate for user-centered, simple, modern design Ensure that solutions align to brand standards Present designs and defend work to stakeholders and senior leadership for review and feedback Develop personas, storyboards, information architecture, interaction design, wireframes and UI designs. Undergraduate GPA 3.0 or higher in related major 1-3 years of UX, UI design experience is preferred. Portfolio is a must. Portfolio should showcase a good mix of web and mobile applications. Excellent strategic problem-solving and decision-making skills in the field of user experience and design. Ability to successfully manage several projects simultaneously. Effective in communication, presentations, and negotiations. Required skills Design Research, Design Thinking, Experience Design, Interactive Design, Interaction Design, Industrial Design, User Experience (UX), User Experience (UX) Design, UI/UX Design Job Type: Full-time

title: UI UX Designer Consultant
description: Join Accenture and help transform leading organizations and communities around the world. The sheer scale of our capabilities and client engagements and the way we collaborate, operate and deliver value provides an unparalleled opportunity to grow and advance.  The interactive revolution is changing everything. It’s everywhere – transforming how we work and play. Are you reacting to the disruption each day or are you leading the way as a digital disrupter? Accenture Interactive is driving these exciting changes and bringing them to life across 40 industries in more than 120 countries. At the forefront of Accenture Interactive, you’ll create it, own it and make it a reality for clients looking to better serve their connected customers and operate always-on enterprises. Join us and become an integral part of our experienced interactive team with the credibility, expertise and insight clients depend on.  Interactive is a design and innovation consultancy. We create useful, effective, and desirable digital services that people love. We help the world’s leading businesses make complex systems simple and elegant with the power of design.  What responsibilities will you have?  Ensure our work communicates clearly and is on-brand. Understand Visual Design as a discipline and a practice. Explain and discuss design decisions and give design feedback. Contribute to the definition and creation of flexible, coherent design systems and component libraries. Partner with design, technology, and project management to ensure the project meets creative, strategy, and project objectives. Design mood boards, comps (with and without wireframes), concept sketches, presentation decks, style guides, and storyboards. Understand brand strategy and the organizational dynamics of assigned brands, including the critical processes that drive them and the key players involved. Translate or extend the brand identity system to digital touchpoints. Attend and help plan studio and community events and workshops.   What skills & experience are we looking for?  Design experience, experience at a digital agency is beneficial. Minimum 4 years of experience as a UIUX Designer or a similar profile Bachelor’s degree or relevant fine arts/design degree Proficiency of Microsoft Office, InDesign, Illustrator, CDR, Premiere Pro After Effects, Photoshop, Adobe experience manager on both PC and Mac platforms experience with video editing, motion graphics, and prototyping software is a plus. Advanced digital design portfolio with examples of mobile and touch work that demonstrates conceptual problem solving and the ability to define look and feel for integrated experiences. Advanced understanding of delivery methodologies with an emphasis on agile. Advanced ability to utilize feedback/direction from the Clients/project manager to generate multiple design explorations and iterate those designs. Ability to speak comfortably and professionally in client presentations. Unite and inspire designers, creating world-class work. Consistently create and elevate brilliant design thinking in our studio and beyond. Collaborate on products and services that build the business and change the way our clients think about design. What’s in it for you?  All of our Accenture Interactive professionals receive comprehensive training covering business acumen, technical and professional skills development. You'll also have opportunities to hone your functional skills and expertise in an area of specialization. We offer a variety of formal and informal training programs at every level to help you acquire and build specialized skills faster. Learning takes place both on the job and through formal training conducted online, in the classroom, or in collaboration with others. The sheer variety of work we do, and the experience it offers, provide an unbeatable platform from which to build a career.  About Accenture  Accenture is a leading global professional services company, providing a broad range of services in strategy and consulting, interactive, technology and operations, with digital capabilities across all of these services. We combine unmatched experience and specialized capabilities across more than 40 industries – powered by the world’s largest network of Advanced Technology and Intelligent Operations centers. With 505,000 people serving clients in more than 120 countries, Accenture brings continuous innovation to help clients improve their performance and create lasting value across their enterprises. Visit us at www.accenture.com

title: UI/ UX Designer
description: About the role  As a UI/UX Designer, you are expected to execute on the design projects assigned to you by the Senior UI/UX Designer. You will be creating delightful eCommerce user experiences through data-driven decisions. You are comfortable with analyzing, identifying and communicating opportunities from data to make informed human-centered design decisions.  As a UI/UX Designer you will be working directly with a Senior UI/UX Designer and Software Engineers who will make your designs come to life. You will be supporting your team lead to product and execute project designs for both Tinkerlust and Soleluna.  You will have the privilege of directly impacting our user’s experience through your designs. This can come in the form of designing a fresh new user experience for our seller mobile app or improving our existing customer experience on the web.  UI/UX Designers at Tinkerlust are design masters. You are expected to have a strong understanding of design thinking, being able to empathize, define, ideate, prototype and test solutions. Together with your familiarity with tools of your trade like Figma or Adobe XD, you can quickly prototype ideas independently.  As a UI/UX Designer at Tinkerlust, you will get to experience all aspects of building a product from designing user experiences from zero to the engineering process of bringing your designs to life.  Tasks and Responsibilities  Build a basic understanding of the business process at Tinkerlust and Soleluna. This can be in the form of:  Learning existing user flow for both Seller and Customers of Tinkerlust  Learning the different types of data is available in our applications. For example, understanding what each attribute of a Tinkerlust Product represents.  Produce high quality wireframes and prototypes through design thinking and attention to detail to achieve product and business objectives for both Tinkerlust and Soleluna.  Actively identifying opportunities for improvement, supported with data-driven analysis, in our web and mobile applications. This can come in the form of:  Requesting data from BI to analyze user behavior in a certain page  Doing research and ideations based on the analysis  Implementing and monitoring design improvement after release  Documenting the entire process  Collaborating with other designers to execute on them  Document the design process for each new feature. For example, documenting research findings, ideations, and usability testing, and release and monitor the impact after the product release  Collaborate with Software Engineers from Tinkerlust throughout your design process to ensure technical feasibility of your designs.  Define and maintain the visual and UX patterns for our products to cultivate a consistent and intuitive experience  Maintain and execute on update requests for Soleluna’s website through a WYSWYG web builder. Must Haves  1+ years of experience in designing for web and mobile applications  Impressive online portfolio or samples of work demonstrating experience creating user-centered design solutions and UI/UX design expertise.  Showcase research and knowledge in the industry’s latest trends and technologies.  High proficiency in design and wireframing tools related to creating mobile and web application interfaces. Experience in Figma and Adobe XD is a plus.  Strong visual design skills to complement your UX skill.  A team player with excellent communication, presentation, and interpersonal skills.  Ability to clearly and effectively communicate design processes, ideas, and solutions to your team members.  Strong understanding of the concepts of user-centered design and design thinking, and their importance.  Open to receiving feedback and constructive criticism  Passionate about all things UI/UX and other areas of design and innovation.  Nice to Haves  Proficient with Photoshop/Illustrator  Basic understanding HTML and CSS

title: Junior UI/UX Designer
description: Gather and evaluate users' requirements in collaboration with Project Managers and Engineers.  Illustrate design ideas using storyboards, process flows, and sitemaps.  Design Graphic user interface elements, like menus, tabs, and widgets,  Build page navigation buttons and search fields  Develop UI mockups and prototypes that clearly illustrate how sites function and look  Create original graphic designs (e.g. images, sketches and tables)  Prepare and present rough drafts to internal teams and CEO  Identify and troubleshoot UX problems (e.g. responsiveness)  Conduct layout adjustments based on user feedback  Adhere to style standards on fonts, colors, and images. Proven work experience as UI/UX designer or similar roles  Minimum 1-year of experience as a UI/UX designer will be advantageous. Fresh Graduates are WELCOME to apply as long as have a true passion for design.  A portfolio of design projects will be an advantage for skills review  Knowledge of wireframe tools (e.g. Wireframe)  Strong in Google Analytical, Search Engine Optimization (SEO) and Technica Copywriting (Mandatory).  Strong in Autistic design, 3D Infographic for content soaked.  Up-to-date knowledge of design software such as Adobe Illustrator and Photoshop  Team spirit, Strong communication skills to collaborate with internal as well external teams.  Good time management skills (mandatory) especially toward projects deadlines  Strong creativity within scopes needed.  willing to work onsite in West Jakarta

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Job Description: Work with the product managers and researchers to help conduct user research. Translate research findings and user pain points into simple and usable user experience design. Craft user journey maps, flowcharts, wireframes, wireflows to support product requirements / user stories. Iterate, evaluate, and test low-fidelity and high-fidelity prototypes as needed. Work with other designers to maintain consistent design standards. Advocate design system adoption to product managers and engineers.  Job Requirement: Bachelor’s Degree from relevant majors. (Visual Communication Design, Human-Computer Interaction, Computer Science) 1-3 years of working experience as UI/UX or product designers are preferred. Understand UI/UX trends, principles, and best practices. Have analytical & critical thinking skills to crystallise abstract insights into actionable solutions. UX Certifications from respectable institutions are a plus.

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Baliola bergerak dibidang NFT Marketplace yang menjual NFT Artwork dari seniman kepada masyarakat di dunia. Baliola membutuhkan beberapa UI/UX Staff dengan posisi UI/UX Designer. Berikut spesifikasinya: UI/UX Designer 1. TUGAS DAN TANGGUNG JAWAB - Membuat tampilan desain antarmuka aplikasi. - Membuat design asset seperti icon, ilustrasi, font, dan warna. - Kolaborasi dengan tim desain. - Bertanggung jawab membuat desain prototype aplikasi. - Bertanggung jawab dengan hasil output design dalam aplikasi. - Mendesain interaksi setiap elemen yang ada di halaman sehingga memudahkan pengguna (user friendly). -Melakukan iterasi pada desain aplikasi dan/atau situs yang telah dibuat dengan mengakomodasi masukan dari user. -Memaksimalkan pengalaman pengguna pada desain interface produk digital. 2. PERSYARATAN UMUM DAN KUALIFIKASI - Laki – laki atau perempuan berpenampilan menarik - Usia maksimal 30 tahun - Pendidikan minimal SMA/SMK / D3 / S1 mencakup semua jurusan - Lokasi penempatan di Kota Denpasar - Menguasai Figma atau AdobeXD - Mampu Membuat Wireframe - Mampu Membuat Tampilan Desain UI/UX 5 hari kerja seminggu (Senin-Jumat) Penempatan di Denpasar Utara. Jenis Pekerjaan: Penuh Waktu Gaji: Rp2.000.000 - Rp4.000.000 per bulan Pendidikan: D1-D4 (Diutamakan) Tenggat Lamaran: 30/06/2022

title: Senior UI/UX Designer
description: About us Dropsuite is a Cloud based software platform that enables businesses to easily backup, recover and protect their digital assets. We do this through a network of preferred reseller partners who have a combined customer reach of millions of small and medium-sized businesses worldwide. Reseller partners are the core of our business. We provide partner with world-class backup software solutions and programs that cover technical support, sales and marketing support, reseller tools, dashboards, multiple languages and more.  We’re looking for a talented Senior UI/UX Designer to join our product team and help take our products to the next level.  Responsibilities Identifying User Experience problems from the products and system to understand how to create a better user experience based on user’s need. Create reliable mockups to visualize the solution that is relevant to the user’s problems and needs. Create prototypes that clearly illustrate how the product functions and interacts with users. Create design assets such as UI Components, Icons and Illustrations. Create a pixel perfect design implementation. Collaborate with Product Managers to create Product Requirement Documents that are related to design stuff. Assist the development team to implement the design solution. Maintaining User Interface consistency across multiple products. Supporting the other designers by maintaining the design style guide or UI Kit. Proactively improve and develop a new collaboration process with internal and external team.   Requirements Minimum of 2 years experience with portfolio of design projects for website or apps, preferably gained this experience in reputable company. Fluent in using User Interface Design tools such as Figma, Adobe XD, Sketch, etc. (Figma is preferable). Good understanding of the product platform (Web responsive & Mobile Apps). Good understanding of the grid implementation, information architecture and familiar with modular UI component structure. Knowledge of HTML, CSS, JS is a plus. Strong communication skills to present the idea clearly in details. Able to collaborate with both internal and external teams. Great sense of ownership, urgency, and self-driven. Good written and verbal communication skills in Bahasa and English.   What we offer Competitive compensation Long term incentives (e.g. Stock options or performance shares – subject to performance) Meaningful career path Health insurance Social Security (BPJS Ketenagakerjaan) Work in a global company with meaningful work and excellent culture   If the above excites you and you are the person we’re looking for; please submit your CV, including your portfolio. We regret to inform that only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.  Posting Statement Dropsuite is an Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action Employers. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender perception or identity, national origin, age, marital status, protected veteran status, or disability status.

title: UI/UX Designer (Officer)
description: As a part of our Product Design team, you will work side-by-side with product owners, researchers, and engineers to manifest the early ideas into an engaging product. To do that, you’ll need a deep understanding of our customers’ needs in order to make their experience with us easy and delightful.  Job Description: Identify basic design process: research, ideation, user journey. These processes will include but not limited to; build a prototype, create pixel-perfect design implementation, determine the interface style, interpret both quantitative and qualitative data as parameters to be documented on the design decisions.  Translate high-level requirements into interactions and artifacts, and transform them into pleasing, functional, and intuitive hi-fidelity interfaces.  Work closely with product owner and other teams under the designated stream/product to execute entire features or product. Here, you are expected to share ideas with Product Owners to solve user-related problems.  Collaborate closely with a multidisciplinary team to build or improve user experience to arrive at simple and intuitive solutions.  Proactively seek/give feedback from other teams to make sure concepts are meeting the intended project goal.  Proactively improve and develop new processes/ systems with a good balance between new trends and product requirements. Good understanding of design process and design principles (UX Laws, Gestalt Principles, Heuristic Usability, etc.).  Strong understanding of visual hierarchy, visual user interface design, motion interaction, and prototyping.  Good with a variety of design and prototyping tools (e.g., Sketch, Figma, InVision, etc.) and knowledge of technologies (e.g., iOS, Android, Web, etc.).  Good problem-solving skill, especially on balancing design aesthetic and product needs.  A team player type of person, experienced in working with agile teams.  Additional Experience  Strong understanding of how computers and humans interact and master the design fundamentals such as color, space, typography, hierarchy, and paddings and grids.

title: Contract Web UX/UI Designer
description: We are looking for an experienced UX/UI designer for a an existing SaaS web application for a three month contract. The successful candidate will be a contractor but form part of the core design and development team. All work will be remote. Please include portfolio and previous designs in your application. Required Experience: -Extensive experience with UI/UX design -Extensive experience with Figma, Sketch or other wire framing applications -Experienced using Adobe Suite -The UX goal of this project is to take a highly technical and difficult topic and translate that into a beautiful, intuitive, and functional interface To be a best fit for this project you need: -Ability to communicate clearly -Dedication to meet project deadlines in a timely manner -Attention to details -Able to work effectively from supplied Trello/Notion tasks -Willingness to sign an NDA and intellectual property assignment deed is a must Job Types: Full-time, Contract Contract length: 3 months Salary: Rp5,331,700 - Rp15,995,300 per hour

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Binar Job Connect is currently looking for UI/UX Designer for our hiring partner Waskita Karya, Yokke, SEVIMA, BRIIT, WLB, Bountie. This opportunity will allow you to be hired and work for a reputable company.  What Will You Do?  Evaluate user requirement to create UIUX design with a storyboard, user flow, and process flow  Collaborate with Product Manager and Engineer to define and implement innovative features for the product  Develop UIUX mockups and prototypes that illustrate the function and look of the product  Conduct concept and usability testing and gather feedback  Implement visually pleasing designs  Execute the whole visual design stages. Binar Academy aims to unlock and channel human potential so we can help the world turn into a better place. One of the ways we strive to do that is to channel potential talents to impactful opportunities using our very own job connector, Binar Job Connect.  Binar Job Connect has connected up to 250 talents & candidates; whether it be young & aspirational fresh graduate to tech-savvy team leaders, individuals who decided to start from scratch, and junior engineers to skilled product managers to our experienced hiring partners. Binar Job Connect provides various options of employment, as we intend that everyone processed by us can choose the best career track for them.  What Are We Looking For?  Familiar with wireframe tools (e.g Sketch, Adobe XD, InVision)  Proven UIUX experience, minimum 1-4 years  Familiar with diagraming tools to create flow chart  Experienced in usability testing  Great communication and team work skills  We will look forward to seeing your CV and Portfolio!

title: Sr Graphic Designer / Motion Graphics / UI/UX (Remote)
description: Pave Creative & Marketing Agency is helping people discover and celebrate the world's best brands through a completely renovated marketing, branding, and e-commerce strategy that directly connects and empowers both consumers and brands. Based in Orange County and Los Angeles, California USA, Pave has worked with thousands of brands and businesses from small to Fortune 500 companies across the world. We are only looking for the best of the best talent to join our Pave team. Opportunity Pave's Graphic Designers are a part of the Creative Department and a core to the branding, storytelling, and innovation of the company. With Pave's Creative Department being dubbed as a Creative Agency and a central resource that helps keep things cohesive and aligned both internally and externally- this role works very cross-functionally on a variety of projects. Our Graphic Designers focus on many initiatives from Consumer Marketing events and campaigns, department decks and collateral, social media creative, and even Culture and swag! Pave's Graphic Designers have the opportunity to diversify their skills while given freedom and flexibility to propose new and exciting ideas for Brand. This role reports directly to Pave's Graphics Design Lead. Responsibilities Help manage and lead a variety of creative projects from event assets, social media, print marketing material, web designs, UI/UX, decks and proposals, to culture experiences. Contribute to the ever-evolving branding of Pave, proposing new and fresh ideas on a regular basis. Work collaboratively on specific campaigns, developing initial looks as well as a/b tests. Qualifications Must display strong skills in graphic design work as well as ability to thoroughly understand projects and execute on deliverables Fluent English speaking/writing/reading/listening a must. Must have exceptional knowledge of Adobe Creative Suite Must have advanced knowledge of wireframes and proper design strategies. Has a diverse portfolio and showcases ability to work on a variety of projects from social media graphics, to ad creative, to event collateral. Displays strong knowledge of working within Figma, Xd, Photoshop, Lightroom, and Adobe Illustrator 5+ years of experience including experience either in-house with a Brand or Agency MOTION GRAPHICS skill highly desired VIDEO EDITING skills highly desired Pave is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We embrace diversity and equal opportunity in a serious way. We are committed to building a team that represents a variety of backgrounds, perspectives, and skills. The more inclusive we are, the better our work will be. *PORTOFLIO AND RESUME REQUIRED ALL APPLICANTS WITHOUT BOTH WILL AUTOMATICALLY BE REJECTED Job Type: Full-time Pay: Rp5,740,000 - Rp12,910,000 per month Experience: Graphic design: 1 year (Preferred)

title: Senior UX Designer
description: Sr. UX Designer will collaborate with product managers, technology, and marketing on conceptual models, process flows, user scenarios & tasks, and UI design.  Translate user requirements and complex business processes into highly usable, highly interactive applications by applying a user-centric approach to design, and balancing the end-user experience with the stated business purpose.  Contribute towards user requirements gathering for new product releases.  Conceive, document, and evangelize user interface guidelines and design patterns.  Work across various lifecycle stages of a product, from new products to continuous product improvements through an agile (scrum) process.  Inspire the team to execute your UX vision Bachelor in Design, Information Technology, Computer Science, Visual Communication Design, Psychology or related field from top universities.  Minimum of 5 years of related work experience  Experience in developing the design for new user experiences, creating concepts, designing mockups and specifications, and representing the designs to the product team  Demonstrable leadership, organizational, and communication skills  A team player who is willing to learn and collaborate with others  Ability to analyze problems from end to end and looking to solve the bigger picture  Portfolio is a must!

title: Product Designer - (WhatsApp & Customer Care Touchpoints)
description: Facilitate customer journey vision for WhatsApp & Customer Care channel by researching, conceiving, gathering and documenting requirements.  Create, design, and deliver roadmap for customer journey innovation and optimization that lead to intuitive and seamless customer experience for WhatsApp & Customer Care channel and to be seamlessly aligned with other channels.  Take a customer-centric development approach, data-driven approach, or other approach to deliver development roadmap that enhance customer experience in WhatsApp & Customer Care channel.  Collaborate with UX/UI designers, UX writer, business owners, and other stakeholders to create and deliver engaging user stories, customer journey, and user processes for WhatsApp & Customer Care channel development.  Collaborate with IT team to define and implement innovative solutions to ensure releases of high quality and excellent customer experience for WhatsApp & Customer Care channel.  Collaborate with CX research & analyst to analyze user feedback & activity and provide iteration to enhance the customer experience. Bachelor's degree from any field  Minimum 4 years experience in customer experience/product owner/business analyst role  Good analytical skill to understand customers and business needs  Familiar with user-centered design and agile development  Able to communicate complex business or technical information effectively  Strong collaboration skill to work with cross-functional teams  Preferably have experience in chat bot/customer care application development

title: UI / UX Designer
description: Vodjo is currently seeking UI/UX Designer with a passion for creating amazing user experiences. You possess superior UI/UX skills and are able to translate high-level requirements into interaction flows and then transform them into beautiful, intuitive, and functional user interfaces. REQUIRED SKILLS Proven work experience as a UI/UX Designer or similar role. Great taste and love for beautiful design. Excellent understanding of the design process and principles. Strong attention to detail. Experience with interactive and responsive web design. Experience with mobile app design. Able to defend design decisions and take on feedback/critique to improve designs. Effective time management and ability to prioritize tasks. title: UI/UX Artist
description: Company Description  Are You Looking for a Great Place to Work? Join the Game! A leading digital and social game publisher, Gameloft® has established itself as one of the top innovators in its field since 2000. Gameloft creates games for all digital platforms and with an audience of 157 million monthly users offers via Gameloft Advertising Solutions a unique level of visibility and involvement to advertisers. Gameloft operates its own established franchises such as Asphalt®, Order & Chaos, Modern Combat and Dungeon Hunter and also partners with major rights holders including Universal, Illumination Entertainment, Disney®, Marvel®, Hasbro®, Fox Digital Entertainment, Mattel® and Ferrari®. Gameloft distributes its games in over 100 countries and employs 6,000 people worldwide. Gameloft is a Vivendi company.   Job Description  Responsibilities: Develop high level and/or detailed storyboards, mockups, and prototypes to effectively communicate interaction and design ideas, Design user interfaces to meet elicited requirements Create original graphic designs Identify and troubleshoot UX problems Conduct layout adjustments based on feedbacks   Qualifications  Requirements: Proven work experience as a UI/UX Designer or similar role. Portfolio of design projects. Knowledge of Design System (e.g Google Material, Material UI, etc) Familiarity with vector-based image/illustration. Familiar with Figma, Adobe XD, and Up-to-date knowledge of design software like Protopie, Principle. Good Understanding of Design Process and usage of data. Cross-platform design experiences (Web, Android, iOS,) with knowledge about platform advantages and limitations. Team spirit; strong communication skills to collaborate with various stakeholders. Good time-management skills.  Thanks for agreeing to take part in this survey and your interest in our Company. As part of our Recruitment process, we would like to know more about your interests when applying in Gameloft. The survey may take you less than 5 minutes to complete, and is totally anonymous. Your honest answers will have no impact on whether you will get the job or not. They will only be used to support our continuous efforts to match our Employer brand with our candidate’s expectations. Please copy the URL below to your web browser in case the link doesn't work properly. https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/PVFDD2P Many thanks for your help!  Additional Information  Why join the Gameloft universe?  Because you want to be part of an exceptional experience, within a company that is constantly growing! Because you want to work with talented people who are industry pioneers! Because you want to join a global company and meet great people around the world from all walks of life. Or, just because you’re looking for a great place to work!  What we offer:  Teamwork with international talents Recognition and rewards Creative and modern workplace Continuous and professional training Work hard, play hard  We can’t wait to find our next great talent!  Please submit your CV, cover letter or portfolio (if applicable) Please note that only selected candidates will be contacted and your CV will be saved in our files for a period of 6 months.

title: Senior UI Developer
description: Why Design Everest? A true market leader, with top-tier venture capital backing, Design Everest is a next-generation tech-managed marketplace of Architecture, Engineering, and pre-construction services in the traditionally antiquated construction industry. Our proprietary software 'Design Hub' allows us to start working on a home remodeling or construction project leveraging the cloud. Our software enables state-of-the-art ‘Tele Construction’ services and virtual consultations with our licensed Architects and Engineers at client convenience - Safe, Convenient, Economic. In Design Everest, challenges galvanize us into finding solutions, and our success is driven by our software and business model innovations. Over the years, we’ve been reinventing the massive pre-construction process, with a TAM of $100 Billion+ in the US alone, and have reached a critical growth stage where our model is poised to disrupt the entire AEC marketplace. This opportunity will allow you to be a part of this market-leading disruption and to leave your mark on the success story of Design Everest and the real-estate and construction industry. The opportunity: We are seeking an experienced full-time Senior UI Developer to join our global home-based remote teams. This is the perfect opportunity for an experienced UI engineer with an entrepreneurial spirit to build best-in-class web and mobile applications for two-sided market platforms that users love and will disrupt the AEC industry. What will you do: Design and Build sophisticated and highly scalable apps using Flutter. Collaborated actively with UX-UI designers and product owners rapidly grasp a problem and apply industry-standard technologies to the User Interface solutions. Takes ownership of customer problems, works diligently to solve those, and measures success both quantitatively and qualitatively. Responsible for analysis, design, estimation, code, automated test, deploy, and maintenance of responsive, intuitive, and user-friendly interfaces that are continuously improved to deliver increasing value to the user. Inspires and motivates team members to set high standards of excellence and commitment to a common goal. Work on a small team, in an agile development environment, keeping the team up to date on progress, workflow, and blockers. What you bring to the table: Bachelor’s degree, preferably in computer science, information systems, or related experience. Minimum 5 years experience in UI development. Passionate about modern UI technologies, beautiful and polished UIs, building atop a react/redux style state management system in Flutter. You’re excited to work in Flutter and have experience working with UI platforms such as Flutter, React, or Angular. Proficient with HTML and SCSS technologies. Comfortable with CI/CD pipelines using Git & any CI/CD tools. Experience working in an Agile- or Scrum-based environment. Solid organizational skills including attention to detail and multitasking skills. Desire to work on a platform that is relentlessly customer-focused at an early-stage startup. Must have excellent communication skills, both written and oral, and a strong work ethic. A self-starter capable of working independently with minimal supervision. What’s in it for you: 100% remote work. Working for a fast-growth silicon valley startup that is funded & has a product-market fit. Competitive compensation plan and benefits. PTO. Design Everest is proud to be an equal opportunity employer and committed to having a diverse and inclusive workforce from all backgrounds and parts of the world. Design Everest does not accept unsolicited resumes from agencies. About Design Everest What makes us special Our company consists of talented and passionate employees. We attribute our success to our awesome team who has project experience in almost every city in California, and we are passionate about investing in the talent we have and recruiting the best to join us. We are on a continuous search for talented candidates with a keen sense of business and a willingness to succeed as part of a team. We are proud to be an equal opportunity employer and committed to having a diverse and inclusive workforce from all backgrounds and parts of the world. Job Type: Full-time Pay: From Rp363,535,000 per year Application Question(s): How many years of experience do you have with Angular? How many years of experience do you have with SCSS and HTML? Shift availability: Night Shift (Required)

title: Wordpress Developer
description: SoftwareSeni is a Software Development Company based in Yogyakarta & Sydney, Australia. We have been designing and developing phone apps, websites, and mobile experiences. We love solving tough problems – from user experience to design and code. We build enterprise web-based solutions for clients all over the world, from Australia, Indonesia, Europe, Africa, and America. Our clients from Indonesia: Astra International, Traveloka, Angkasa Pura, Peduli Anak Foundation. Our clients from Australia: Bike Exchange, Downsizing, Red Balloon, Sectara, and many more.  What will you get? Competitive Salary. We believe that salary is one of the main factors that keep the employee in the company, therefore we can guarantee a competitive salary for our Staff. Freedom to choose working arrangements. Our staff are spread throughout Indonesia. We really understand if there are staff who can't leave their families. So you can choose to work from the office, from home, or flexible home-office. Career Development & Training. We have a wonderful onboarding process where we help a new team member to get familiar with the way we work. Reasonable & Flexible Schedules. We are encouraging a culture where people can have a good work-life balance. Our schedules are pretty flexible. Need to run an errand in the middle of the day? Totally cool. English Class. Working in SoftwareSeni means that you would get massive improvement on your English, both spoken and written guarantee! Annual Leave entitlement. 12 working days which can be taken after 3 months of joining. Relocation Allowance. We provide a relocation allowance if you do not live in Yogyakarta. The allowance will cover moving costs for you and your family. Salary Review Twice a year. We will review your salary twice annually in December and June. So, you can focus on work and improve your performance every day. Furniture Allowance. A program from SoftwareSeni while working from home due to the Covid pandemic. We don't want our staff having back pain! WFH Activities. We provide fun icebreaker activities in the middle of our working hours to chill and build relationships with all of the staff. Sounds fun, right? Birthday Leave. We also want to celebrate our staff happiest day by giving them half-day leave on their birthday   Skills & Requirements : At least 1-year of experience with PHP, SQL, CI, Laravel, and Javascript, preferably using WordPress. Familiar with WordPress setup templates configuration Familiar with Woo Commerce Self-motivated & hardworking. Comfortable working with overseas clients. Good English communication (written and spoken). Able to work in a team.   Key Responsibilities : Write code using WordPress best practices. Provide excellent troubleshooting and solve bugs. Record all project time as required. Be committed to the deadlines. Record all project time as required. Provide technical support for projects and the team.

title: ReactJS Developer
description: Build Your Career With Mitrais! Build your Career with Mitrais! We're urgently looking for a great Javascript developer who is proficient with ReactJS to be part of our team for an immediate start. Our client is an Australian food industry startup company seeking to build their application in React.js with a Node.js backend. To accomplish this they need a number of Software Engineers to join their team. Your primary focus will be on developing user interface components and implementing them following well-known React.js workflows (such as Flux or Redux). You will ensure that these components and the overall application are robust and easy to maintain. You will coordinate with the rest of the team working on different layers of the infrastructure. Therefore, a commitment to collaborative problem solving, sophisticated design, and quality products are important. What will you be doing? Developing new user-facing features using React.js in a progressive web-app as well as desktop web-app Building reusable components and front-end libraries for future use Translating designs and wireframes into high-quality code Optimizing components for maximum performance across a vast array of web-capable devices and browsers Develop CI/CD pipelines to support your development efforts Manage change control within the product life cycle. Identify design improvements and value engineering opportunities. Attend design reviews and project technical progress meetings. What about you? Exceptional spoken English and communication skills At least 3+ (3+ projects) years developing apps using React JS 5+ years in front-end software engineering Have delivered PWAs on both iOS and Android using React Undergraduate University degree. Strong proficiency in JavaScript, including DOM manipulation and the JavaScript object model Thorough understanding of React.js and its core principles Experience with popular React.js workflows (such as Flux or Redux) Familiarity with newer specifications of EcmaScript Experience with data structure libraries (e.g., Immutable.js) Knowledge of isomorphic React is a plus Good understanding of Web Performance standards and Progressive WebApps (PWA). Strong understanding of RESTful APIs Knowledge of modern authorization mechanisms, such as JSON Web Token and Oauth Familiarity with modern front-end build pipelines and tools Experience with common front-end development tools such as Babel, Webpack, NPM, etc. Ability to understand business requirements and translate them into technical requirements What can Mitrais offer you? A CAREER, not a JOB! Competitive salary Excellent working environment, with the possibility to relocate to our regional offices and work remotely Free English classes, English is our working language Lots of opportunities to improve your competencies on our technical boot camps, certification programs, and soft skills training courses Hackathons with big prizes!

title: Node Js Developer
description: SoftwareSeni is a Software Development Company based in Yogyakarta & Sydney, Australia. We have been designing and developing phone apps, websites, and mobile experiences. We love solving tough problems – from user experience to design and code. We build enterprise web-based solutions for clients all over the world, from Australia, Indonesia, Europe, Africa, and America. Our clients from Indonesia: Astra International, Traveloka, Angkasa Pura, Peduli Anak Foundation. Our clients from Australia: Bike Exchange, Downsizing, Red Balloon, Sectara, and many more.  What will you get? Competitive Salary. We believe that salary is one of the main factors that keep the employee in the company, therefore we can guarantee a competitive salary for our Staff. Freedom to choose working arrangements. Our staff are spread throughout Indonesia. We really understand if there are staff who can't leave their families. So you can choose to work from the office, from home, or flexible home-office. Career Development & Training. We have a wonderful onboarding process where we help a new team member to get familiar with the way we work. Reasonable & Flexible Schedules. We are encouraging a culture where people can have a good work-life balance. Our schedules are pretty flexible. Need to run an errand in the middle of the day? Totally cool. English Class. Working in SoftwareSeni means that you would get massive improvement on your English, both spoken and written guarantee! Annual Leave entitlement. 12 working days which can be taken after 3 months of joining. Relocation Allowance. We provide a relocation allowance if you do not live in Yogyakarta. The allowance will cover moving costs for you and your family. Salary Review Twice a year. We will review your salary twice annually in December and June. So, you can focus on work and improve your performance every day. Furniture Allowance. A program from SoftwareSeni while working from home due to Covid pandemic. We don't want our staff having back pain! WFH Activities. We provide fun icebreaker activities in the middle of our working hours to chill and build relationships with all of the staff. Sounds fun, right? Birthday Leave. We also want to celebrate our staff happiest day by giving them half-day leave on their birthday.   Requirements: Previous working experience as a Node.js Developer for 4 years. Have good knowledge about Node.js and Javascript in general (knowledge in ES6 is preferred). Hands on experience with HTML and CSS. Development experience working with object oriented and functional programming. Applicable knowledge of popular modules and frameworks such as Express JS and React JS. Familiarity with non-relational database like Mongodb or DynamoDB. Have good knowledge javascript unit testing. Have good knowledge and experience on building REST API using NodeJS. Strong analytical skills and problem solving aptitude. Attention to details   Responsibilities: Work as part of a team developing applications and services using Agile development methods. Contribute to team and organizational improvements in process and infrastructure. Code, test and operate node.js based services. Effectively use tools and ingenuity to identify and fix defects before they become a problem.

title: Full Stack Web Developer
description: Company Description  Be a Part of Our Global Community! Join the Game! Leader in the development and publishing of games, Gameloft® has established itself as one of the top innovators in its field since 2000. Gameloft creates games for all digital platforms, two of which are featured in the “Top 10 iOS Games by All-Time Worldwide Downloads” from App Annie. Gameloft operates its own established franchises such as Asphalt®, Dragon Mania Legends, Modern Combat and Dungeon Hunter and also partners with major rights holders including Disney®, LEGO®, Universal, Illumination Entertainment, Marvel®, Hasbro®, Fox Digital Entertainment, Mattel®, Lamborghini® and Ferrari®. Gameloft distributes its games in over 100 countries and employs 4,300 people worldwide. Every month, 80 million unique users can be reached by advertisers in Gameloft games with Gameloft Advertising Solutions, a leading B2B offering dedicated to brands and agencies. Gameloft is a Vivendi company. All trademarks referenced above are owned by their respective trademark owners.   Job Description  Work with the team members to translate existing requirements into reporting tools and services according to the client’s needs Develop new features and updates for our reporting tools and APIs Maintain the existing tool and services backend Collaborate with members of the team to help them identify performance bottlenecks and suggest product improvements Participate in the design and requirements specification for the team’s ETL system and data warehouse  We are looking for a skilled Full Stack Developer to join our Data team. As part of our team, you will build web-based applications for reporting purposes. Our technology stack consists of various programming languages (PHP, Javascript), popular frameworks (Symfony), database systems (MySQL, Redshift, DynamoDB) and client pivoting solutions (Flexmonster)   Qualifications  3+ years of experience working with PHP in MVC frameworks like Symfony (preferred, similar MVC framework experience accepted, e.g. Laravel) 3+ years of experience working with JavaScript/jQuery Experience working with HTML/CSS Good SQL query skills and basic RDBMS design experience Experience with Amazon Web Services Strong OOP skills Good English skills Plus: Experience with Git Experience with Gitlab CI/CD Knowledge of REST, JWT, HTTP Basic/Bearer Auth Knowledge of web application security concepts and best practices Experience with NoSQL solutions Experience with UI/UX design Familiar with Jira, Confluence  Additional Information  Why join the Gameloft universe?  Because you want to be part of an exceptional experience, within a company that is constantly growing! Because you want to work with talented people who are industry pioneers! Because you want to join a global company and meet great people around the world from all walks of life. Or, just because you’re looking for a great place to work!  What we offer:  Teamwork with international talents Recognition and rewards Creative and modern workplace Continuous and professional training Work hard, play hard  We can’t wait to find our next great talent!  Please submit your CV, cover letter or portfolio (if applicable) Please note that only selected candidates will be contacted and your CV will be saved in our files for a period of 6 months.

title: Application Developer
description: About Worldline   Worldline is the European leader in digital payments and number four worldwide, powered by over 20,000 employees in more than 50 countries. Every day, our technology provides the trusted infrastructure for millions of people and businesses around the world - and we´re just getting started. We are on an exciting journey to lead the way towards the next frontier of payments. Our ambitions are extraordinarily high, and we need the best people in the world to bring them to life – people like you.     Job Responsibilities Lead technical discussions with cross-domain teams within the company and provide solutioning towards business requirements. Lead the entire lifecycle such as development planning, estimating, system analysis, design, development, implementation and documentation for customer project or product development. Become expert in own business domain. Responsible in evaluation of technical feasibility and provide a good technical recommendation to business. Contribute to the design and development of software solutions by understanding business challenges, assist in designing frameworks with security, scalability, and performance considerations, develop prototypes quickly, and create robust, high-volume production applications. Develop, test, and optimize solutions and backend code for web-based applications. Perform integration, troubleshooting, and maintenance of developed solutions as needed. Document work as needed in an organized manner. Work in collaborative teams with domain experts and others based on project scope. Lead a technical training for internal and external stakeholders to educate them on best practices and new solutions. Work closely with the Pre-Sales/ Sales teams to resolve client issues, prioritize, and build market or vertical plans for technical services. Assist to define the roadmap, goals, and vision for the product. Assist in defining product technical architecture. Applying best practices and standard operating procedures.   Job Requirements Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Telecommunications, Engineering or equivalent. Minimum of 7 years professional experience in design, development and implementation of Java application with proven practical experience. 5+ years relevant experience building large-scale infrastructure applications or similar experience. Expertise experience in the Card Payment/Digital Payment/Banking industry. Expert in object-oriented design, data structures and algorithms. Expertise experience in Java technologies, frameworks, API, SOAP/RESTful web services, Junit. Expertise experience with front-end development (Angular, React, TypeScript, HTML5, CSS3 or similar JavaScript framework). Database experience with SQL, PostgreSQL, Oracle, or similar database technologies. Experience designing, analyzing and improving efficiency, scalability, and stability of various system resources. Experience owning a particular component, feature or system. Experience building and shipping high quality work and achieving high reliability. Experience improving stability through thoughtful code reviews, appropriate testing, proper rollout, monitoring, and proactive changes. Experience in utilizing data and analysis to explain technical problems and providing detailed feedback and solutions. Experience with Linux environment including Shell scripting and software packaging. Experience with continuous integration, release management and monitoring. Good understanding in building reliable and scalable backend applications leveraging microservices architecture, messaging, streaming, batch processing and variety of technologies. Have exposure in Cloud Services Platform, Docker containers, Kubernetes, OpenShift, etc. Ability to work independently and lead a project. Experience working with clients and business partners. Customer-facing experience translating technical concepts and solutions to non-technical audiences. Proficiency with engineering tools including IDEs, debugger, profilers, version control systems such as GitLab, Git, Maven, Jenkins, JIRA, Confluence Wiki, Artifactory, and etc. Excellent knowledge of agile software development methodologies and industry best practices. Genuine interest in technology, software development as well as high levels of self-motivation. Able to work in a fast-paced, team-oriented environment with minimum supervision. Ability to work under pressure. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Strong interpersonal, organizational, and communications skills. Strong English communication skill (written and oral). Willing to travel when needed. Grow with us, create tomorrow At Worldline, we are dedicated to helping our people unlock their full potential - both professionally and personally. With comprehensive training and development programs, expert communities, and global mobility programs, you will always be able to develop and grow at Worldline - wherever you want to go and whatever you want to do. We also offer flexible hours and remote working, to empower you to be your best self at work and at home. 8 in 10 Worldliners consider Worldline a friendly place to work, and 9 in 10 are satisfied with the training & development they receive. Worldline is proud to be an Equal Opportunity employer. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, colour, national origin, sex (including pregnancy, childbirth, or related medical conditions), sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, status as an individual with a disability, or other applicable legally protected characteristics. Learn more about life at Worldline on careers.worldline.com .    Job Segment: Application Developer, Telecom, Telecommunications, Developer, Engineer, Technology, Engineering

title: Senior Web Developer
description: Department: Development Reporting To (position): Development Manager Location: DKI Jakarta, Indonesia Job Description: Petrolink is a global company that specializes in user-driven technology for the Energy Industry. We are currently looking for a new Senior Web Developer to join our team. As a member of the development team, you will be a key player in building innovative products that encompass the future of data management, visualization, and analytics in our industry. Our Developers work as part of a multi-disciplinary team in an Agile/DevOps environment. You will be able to deliver high-quality code and be able to build reliable and scalable applications. Document requirements and implementation. Perform code reviews. Work closely with other developers and other staff (including but not limited to Product Manager, Operations, Testers, etc.). Skills & Qualifications: Proven experience in Angular 2+ (preferably above Angular 5). Experience in using NodeJS. Experience with developing new software. Experience in HTML/CSS. Work experience in the development of frameworks and web platforms are key to this position. B Tech/MCA/M Tech in Computer Science or related field. 6+ year’s relevant experience. Good interpersonal skills. Knowledge and experience of working with Agile development methodologies. Preferred Qualifications: Experience with MS SQL, PostgreSQL, Oracle, and NoSQL databases, particularly Cassandra. Experience in React (ReactJS). Experience in Event-Driven Programming including experience with message brokers (RabbitMQ, Kafka, etc.). Experience and/or knowledge of .Net/C# or any OOPS Concepts and technologies. Experience working with CI/CD processes and technologies. The above statements are intended to describe the general nature and level of work being performed. They are not intended to be construed as an exhaustive list of all responsibilities, duties and skills. Interested applicants fulfilling the above criteria, please send your resume to careers.indonesia@petrolink.com.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Full-Stack Developer If you’ve been looking for that opportunity to align yourself with a fast-growing startup in Australia then this role is for you. Vimi is an online video production platform to create simple and affordable marketing videos. We are a passionate team of talented individuals with the mission of delivering the world’s most accessible digital content. We are proven on the MVP stage with numerous validations from prominent accelerator programs and funds. Our team is growing on all fronts, with opportunities for big thinkers to guide the development of the product and the company. We are looking for developers who are passionate about using technology to solve real problems and create valuable workflows for users. We believe in the impact we can create in our industry and are on a path to creating a team of problem-solvers who can bring this vision to reality. Our tech stack We are building the first parts of our platform with: Typescript and React, using the NextJS development stack GraphQL APIs with RelayJS powered pages PostgreSQL database with Prisma ORM Vercel and Google Cloud Platform for production cloud services and deployments Skills and attributes for success: Expertise with Typescript and React in building modern Full Stack applications from start to finish Back-end skills with NodeJS and frameworks like NextJS. Front-end skills - HTML, CSS, and JavaScript and a good sense of responsive web design. Experience with consuming external API integrations and building REST and GraphQL API services. Database experience with PostgreSQL or equivalent SQL databases. Experience with other backend programming languages and familiarity with computer science concepts. Ability to work in highly collaborative teams and remote teams. Good written and verbal communication skills in English. What will be my key responsibilities? Collaborate in a Product team with designers and developers to design, develop, test and deploy new platform features and functionality for our new SaaS product. Contribute to the design and build evolution of the platform, ensuring the solution will be scalable, reliable, and easy to use. Be involved and take ownership of end-to-end delivery - from solution design, estimation, development, testing and deployment Contribute to engineering discussions across our platform What skills are nice to have? Interest in Product development methodologies and its application in taking a product to market and finding success Experience with AWS, or GCP cloud environments Experience with Mobile application development Startup DNA What we offer: Success as defined by you: We’ll provide the tools and flexibility, so you can make a meaningful impact, your way. Product ownership: We have solved the first part, but now we need you and your expertise to take our vision and champion end-to-end solutions which will shape our product. Remote work: We are flexible in our ways of working and put the focus on collaborating effectively to bring solutions to life. Diverse and inclusive culture: You’ll be embraced for who you are and empowered to use your voice to help others find theirs. Job Type: Full-time Salary: Rp8,000,000 - Rp11,000,000 per month COVID-19 considerations: WORKING AT HOME Ability to commute/relocate: Bandung: Reliably commute or planning to relocate before starting work (Preferred) Experience: Full Stack Developer: 2 years (Preferred) Language: english (Required)

title: Sitecore Developer
description: Build Your Career With Mitrais! Build your Career with Mitrais! We're urgently looking for a great Sitecore developer who is proficient with the design, production, and implementation of software solutions on. NET platform, utilizing Sitecore technology. Our client is an Australian ICT consultancy with a 20-year heritage of delivering transformational digital experiences for many of Australia’s most progressive organizations such as Toyota, Australia Post, BHP, Bupa, APT, City of Melbourne, Frank Green, Movember, Lexus, and Patagonia. They support businesses to build digital products with the right technology, advising leaders on product strategy, technology, customer experience, data analytics, and agile delivery. To further strengthen their position, they need a number of Software Engineers to join their team. Your primary focus will be on developing a Sitecore CMS/MVC solutions. You will ensure that these components and the overall application are robust and easy to maintain. You will coordinate with the rest of the team working on different layers of the infrastructure. Therefore, a commitment to collaborative problem solving, sophisticated design, and quality products is important. What will you be doing? Identify design improvements and value engineering opportunities. Attend design reviews and project technical progress meetings. Gather the requirements from the business and provide the best suitable solution based on Sitecore CMS/MVC. Migrate the legacy web application/portal into Digital marketing websites/portals by using Sitecore CMS, MVC, and latest UI technologies like Angular js, React .js, Vue J.js or the like. Create Sitecore components and view renderings for the websites. What about you? Ability to understand business requirements and translate them into technical requirements Passionate coder with sufficient experience on Microsoft ASP.Net tech stack and experience on the Sitecore MVC platform with superior code quality. Exceptional spoken English and communication skills What can Mitrais offer you? A CAREER, not a JOB! Competitive salary Excellent working environment, with the possibility to relocate to our regional offices and working remotely Free English classes, English is our working language Lots of opportunities to improve your competencies on our technical boot camps, certification programs and soft skills training courses Hackathons with big prizes! Take a break with Happy Hours, Billiard Tables, gaming rooms, and free drinks and snacks to keep you 100% effective

title: Angular Developer
description: SoftwareSeni is a Software Development Company based in Yogyakarta & Sydney, Australia. We have been designing and developing phone apps, websites, and mobile experiences. We love solving tough problems – from user experience to design and code. We build enterprise web-based solutions for clients all over the world, from Australia, Indonesia, Europe, Africa, and America. Our clients: Astra International, Traveloka, Angkasa Pura, Bike Exchange, Downsizing, Red Balloon, Sectara, and many more.  What will you get? Competitive Salary. We believe that salary is one of the main factors that keep the employee in the company, therefore we can guarantee a competitive salary for our Staff. Freedom to choose working arrangements. Our staff are spread throughout Indonesia. We really understand if there are staff who can't leave their families. So you can choose to work from the office, from home, or flexible home-office. Career Development & Training. We have a wonderful onboarding process where we help a new team member to get familiar with the way we work. Reasonable & Flexible Schedules. We are encouraging a culture where people can have a good work-life balance. Our schedules are pretty flexible. Need to run an errand in the middle of the day? Totally cool. English Class. Working in SoftwareSeni means that you would get massive improvement on your English, both spoken and written guarantee! Annual Leave entitlement. 12 working days which can be taken after 3 months of joining. Relocation Allowance. We provide a relocation allowance if you do not live in Yogyakarta. The allowance will cover moving costs for you and your family. Salary Review Twice a year. We will review your salary twice annually in December and June. So, you can focus on work and improve your performance every day. Furniture Allowance. A program from SoftwareSeni while working from home due to Covid pandemic. We don't want our staff having back pain! WFH Activities. We provide fun icebreaker activities in the middle of our working hours to chill and build relationships with all of the staff. Sounds fun, right? Birthday Leave. We also want to celebrate our staff happiest day by giving them half-day leave on their birthday.   Requirements Minimal 2 years experience on Angular. Familiarity with Angular 9/10 is a plus. Understand Typescript or Javascript ECMAScript 2015 (ES6) Excellent knowledge of event-based programming with Javascript Familiarity with OOP and Service/Controller architecture Familiarity with HTML, CSS3 Preferably developer with experience in ReactJS or VueJS Understanding of Software Engineering practices (software requirement, design, testing, and configuration management) Good English communication skills   Responsibilities: Development of SoftwareSeni’s products Work as a team to investigate and resolve issues

title: Process Engineer (Pharmaceutical)
description: Job description Job Summary If you are ready to bring your talent and engineering skills to meet exciting and new challenges, we look forward to having you join our team of world-class professionals. We consult, design, test, and innovate engineering solutions for pharmaceutical clients of every size, and we have an opening for an experienced and hands-on engineer to lead projects, design solutions and commission and qualify them. This position will allow you to work with cutting-edge computer design tools and travel to interface with our regional and international clients. We strongly believe that our engineers need to be multi-faceted and hence will require the candidate to pick up expertise and knowledge outside of his/her area of current specialty. We offer a competitive salary and benefits package, as well as a work environment that is both fun and professional. Job Responsibilities This role will be based in our office in Bali, Indonesia. Only candidates who are allowed to work in Indonesia need apply. The candidates have to be proficient in English as the role requires supporting projects outside of Indonesia. The ideal candidates should have experience or a strong interest to pick up skills in the following areas: Develop engineering drawings (eg. P&IDs, PFDs, GAs, line diagrams, etc.) and 3-D piping and equipment design using AutoCAD, Bentley, Inventer, Solidworks, etc. and current sanitary design requirements as per ASME BPE. The expectation is that the process engineer should be able to draft or model on his/her own or pick up these skills along the way. Write, review and defend technical documents such as CQV test protocols (IQ/OQ/PQ), SOPs, deviation reports, tech memos, etc; Critique and evaluate engineering documents such as technical specs, equipment/component/instrument data sheets, P&IDs, piping isometrics, GA drawings, sizing calculations, functional specifications, etc; Demonstrate ability to lead technical projects from concept through implementation. Perform activities like FAT/SAT and Installation verification for new equipment and also for modifications to existing equipment. Perform Software FAT. Review vendor turnover package documentation. Manage equipment construction activities associated with implementation of engineering projects. Support all phases of engineering project implementation to meet scope, schedule, budget, quality, and safety requirements. Coordinate with multi-disciplinary team like Automation, Manufacturing, Technical Services and Validation for improvements or implementing changes associated with engineering projects. Draft and execute commissioning protocols related to production equipment in the Cell Culture or Purification areas. Responsibility to adhere to any applicable EHS requirements. Commitment to a fair and respectful relationship to others and behaviour in accordance with the Company's Code of Conduct. Any other duties as assigned by the process engineering team. Job Skills & Qualifications Required: A good understanding of design principles and standards within the biopharmaceutical facilities. Process and equipment knowledge of biological drug substance manufacturing processes; upstream/downstream unit operations expertise highly preferable. Read &Understand Software Functional Specification. Knowledge/ Experience in DeltaV and/or PLC programming, is an added advantage. Thorough knowledge of current Good Manufacturing Practices (cGMP) and Good Engineering Practices (GEP). Good knowledge of EHS and risk management practices. Good Project Management Skill Understanding equipment commissioning, various stages of qualification and process activities Good communication skills. Ability to work both independently and as part of a team. Punctual and able to meet deadlines. Excellent oral and written communication skills. Being hands-on. Open to travel and work at project sites outside Indonesia Ability to multi-task Adaptable and curious Preferred: Experience with 3D Modelling programs such as AutoCAD Diploma in Mechanical Engineering / Electrical Engineering / Biologics & Process Technology / Chemical & Pharmaceutical Technology/ Biotechnology / Chemical & Biomolecular Experience in bio-processing engineering in a manufacturing environment is highly desirable Experience in a GMP environment is preferred. Job Types: Full-time, Permanent Ability to commute/relocate: Denpasar: Reliably commute or willing to relocate with an employer-provided relocation package (Preferred) Education: S1 (Preferred) Experience: 2D / 3D Design using AutoCAD: 1 year (Preferred) Language: English (Preferred) Work Remotely: Temporarily due to COVID-19

title: Calibration Engineer (Software System & Business Process)
company: Micron Semiconductor Asia Operations Pte. Ltd
description: Our vision is to transform how the world uses information to enrich life for all. Join an inclusive team passionate about one thing: using their expertise in the relentless pursuit of innovation for customers and partners. The solutions we build help make everything from virtual reality experiences to breakthroughs in neural networks possible. We do it all while committing to integrity, sustainability, and giving back to our communities. Because doing so can fuel the very innovation we are pursuing.JR25803 Calibration Engineer (Software System & Business Process) Description: This is a global role in Global Quality organization. Our organization specializes in building systems and business processes to enable and ensure consistency in the quality of Micron products regardless of which plant it was manufactured in. We are looking for a highly driven individual to lead and drive network alignment and enable consistent execution through the set up and deployment of an exciting 'Calibration Software System'. This role will challenge the individual with ample growth opportunities, exposing successful candidate to global practices across all Micron functional areas such as design & development, facilities, wafer fabrication, backend component/package assembly and test as well as sub-contractors. We are looking for someone who wants to be constantly challenged, and spearhead impactful programs that ensures the quality of Micron products, and constantly learning new things in the process.  There are two key aspects to this role: Global Calibration Software System Owner Responsible for selection, setup, and deployment of new 'Calibration Software System' throughout Micron global network. Micron global owner for 'Calibration Software System' and responsible for sustaining it, including troubleshooting, and working with software vendor to periodically assess, test and deploy suitable software updates. Responsible for driving consistent execution for all Micron and IATF calibration requirements through 'Calibration Software System' by translating requirements into system requirements and coding it into the system. Drive continuous improvement to 'Calibration Software System' through identifying areas of improvement and implementing system solution through close collaboration with internal stakeholders and software provider.  Global Calibration Software System Business Process Owner: Set up, deploy and maintain 'Calibration Software System Business Process' to describe rules and procedures to maintain the consistency of the calibration requirements across fab, facilities, backend assembly/test, sub contractors, and remote labs. Develop, and set up automated governance metrics to track, and identify areas of non-conformity, and drive sites to conformance on all aspect of 'Calibration Software System Business Process' Drive network year on year continuous improvement through metrics. Lead global teams in identifying areas of improvements to 'Calibration Software System Business Process', 'Calibration Software System', and/or governance metrics. May be required to support internal, certification and customer audits, and be part of the solution provider for audit finding resolution at a global level. Engage in external calibration laboratory qualification process: review the feedback/evidence provided by external calibration laboratory and validate if the laboratory can meet Micron and relevant regulatory requirements  Characteristics we are looking for: Strong leadership to lead a network of global Calibration Champions Technically competent and strong in calibration knowledge and calibration industry practices Display systems thinking - ability to see both big picture (developing a process), and diving in to drive the details (define step by step procedures) and how it interacts with various other processes in Micron. Energized by working with many different parties, and solving issues that are highly complex in nature Great collaboration skills and loves working with many parties with different points of view and reaching a common direction. Able to learn on the fly, understand the situation, and finding best solution that is effective and efficient for Micron Tenacious, and never give up. Or able to prioritize the key items to tackle without feeling overwhelmed. Successful candidate will be based in Penang, with the team in Taiwan, Singapore and US, we expect you to be highly self motivated, independent and yet a team player at the same time.  Additionally: This role may include occasional flying for business ( At least 3 years of hands-on experience specializing in driving calibration programs for the company or customers. Priority will be given to candidates who demonstrates large scale calibration experience at a company level such as: Leading software system relevant for managing calibration program for the company, Calibration program or software developer, Calibration service provider experience. Must have Semiconductor back-end experience (Component/package assembly or Test) Familiar with calibration relevant regulatory requirements (IATF16949, ISO17025) Able to do basic programming for purpose of automating metrics and dashboard Fluent in English, with good clear writing skills Bachelor degree in the related field of Engineering or Science Track record of driving and leading company wide programs  About Micron Technology, Inc. We are an industry leader in innovative memory and storage solutions transforming how the world uses information to enrich lifefor all. With a relentless focus on our customers, technology leadership, and manufacturing and operational excellence, Micron delivers a rich portfolio of high-performance DRAM, NAND, and NOR memory and storage products through our Micron® and Crucial® brands. Every day, the innovations that our people create fuel the data economy, enabling advances in artificial intelligence and 5G applications that unleash opportunities - from the data center to the intelligent edge and across the client and mobile user experience. Please note that in order to assist in providing a safe and healthy workplace for all Micron team members, new employment offers for jobs based in India, Malaysia, Singapore, and the U.S., are contingent upon the applicant's provision of a copy of their COVID-19 vaccination document to Micron on a confidential basis prior to their scheduled start date confirming that they have completed the COVID-19 vaccination process, subject to any written request for medical or religious accommodation and to the extent permitted by applicable law.  To learn more, please visit micron.com/careers  All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, veteran or disability status.  To request assistance with the application process and/or for reasonable accommodations,please contact Micron Prohibits the use of child labor and complies with all applicable laws, rules, regulations, and other international and industry labor standards. Micron does not charge candidates any recruitment fees or unlawfully collect any other payment from candidates as consideration for their employment with Micron.
