title: Database Administrator Engineer
description: You make your impact by deciding what’s best for the team or the company when it comes to building data infrastructure, working out ways in which Blibli.com’s data infrastructure can leave a mark on the customers’ lives by supporting the making of a seamless shopping experience for the customers. As a Senior Database Administrator, some of your roles are to monitor, make sure that the infrastructure stays in line with business requirements or industry practices, and improve the existing infrastructure. 2-3 years experiences in same position  Master’s degree, further education in Computer Science or Software Engineering, or equivalently extensive professional experience in database engineering are preferable  Knowledge and experience in MySQL, MongoDB and PostgreSQL  Firm grasp in SQL and Nosql  Experience in building large-scale database system  Solid understanding of Linux, networking, bash scripting.

title: Database Administrator
description: Perkembangan teknologi yang kian pesat merupakan salah satu tantangan yang harus dihadapi oleh semua perusahaan di Indonesia, termasuk BCA. Menjawab tantangan ini, BCA terus mengedepankan inovasi agar dapat senantiasa menjadi bank yang dapat diandalkan oleh masyarakat. Teknologi dan inovasi di bidang teknologi saat ini berkembang pesat, sehingga BCA membutuhkan Database Administrator yang bertanggung jawab dalam melakukan instalasi, konfigurasi, maintenance, troubleshoot dan capacity planning untuk setiap sistem database yang ada di BCA.  Terdapat 2 jalur untuk menjadi Database Administrator di IT BCA, yaitu:  IT Staff . Karyawan akan melalui masa probation selama 3 bulan dan akan mendapatkan pembekalan teknis, buddy, dan mentor dari IT BCA. Jalur ini terbuka untuk Entry Level dan Experienced Professional .  Karyawan PKWT (Perjanjian Kerja Waktu Tertentu). Karyawan PKWT akan menjalani masa kontrak selama 1 tahun dengan mendapatkan pembekalan teknis, pelatihan soft skill , buddy , dan mentor. Setelah menyelesaikan masa kontrak, karyawan PKWT berkesempatan diangkat menjadi karyawan tetap IT BCA. Jalur ini terbuka untuk Entry Level dan Experienced Professional . Minimal lulusan SMA IPA/SMK untuk jalur karyawan PKWT, dan S1 yang berkaitan dengan Teknik Informatika untuk jalur IT Staff  IPK minimal 2.75 untuk lulusan Diploma/Sarjana dan nilai minimal 70 untuk lulusan SMA/SMK  Usia maksimal 28 tahun  Memiliki pemahaman yang kuat dalam konsep database, lebih disukai bila pernah melakukan manajemen/administrasi database  Memiliki pengetahuan dalam pengoperasian sistem operasi seperti Windows, Unix, dan Linux  Memiliki pengetahuan mengenai teknologi database seperti Oracle, SQL, PostgreSQL, dan MongoDB  Memiliki pengetahuan mengenai Big Data dan infrastruktur Big Data.  Bersedia ditempatkan di Jakarta / Tangerang

title: Database Administrator
description: Mekari is one of the fastest-growing SAAS based companies based out of Jakarta, Indonesia, Mekari is an amalgamation of four very exciting products for businesses, namely, Talenta, Jurnal, Klikpajak, and Qontak, aimed for medium and large businesses to automate their HR management processes, help them with smart & real-time accounting software and help them with tax processing and filing. Talenta, one of the leading HR automation system solutions in Indonesia, has over 110K users with more than 5000 paying clients. To further expand with its offerings, we are looking for a passionate database engineer to join our team.   Responsibilities: Manage MySQL and other non-relational database administrations through multiple product lifecycle environments, from development to mission-critical production systems. Manage cloud-based database servers and processes, including regular maintenance and monitoring of system health and performance, to ensure high levels of performance, availability, and security. Support product development teams for database designs and implementations, including a review on system architecture, contribute to improving future architecture aiming for stability, cost-efficiency, and high levels of performance.   Requirements: Bachelors or higher degree in Computer Science or related fields. Familiar with SQL and relational database theory and knowledge. 5+ years of hands-on experience with production MySQL database operations. Familiar with performance tuning and optimization using native monitoring, troubleshooting, and database performance monitoring tools Familiar with cloud technology (e.g. AWS RDS / Cloud SQL) Familiar with scripting languages (at least one of Shell/Python). Familiar with Linux systems, good system troubleshooting skills. Functional English (written and oral) communication skills. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, in critical situations under pressure as well as day-to-day operations. Detail-oriented with the ability to manage multiple tasks with shifting priorities.   What You Will Get: Competitive salary + daily allowance Private health insurance (outpatient, inpatient, maternity, dental) Allowance for sports activities and glasses/contact lenses Strategic office location, accessible by MRT Flexible working hours and remote work culture Notebook Ownership Program Friendly and dynamic work environment Opportunity to take part in growing Indonesia's no. 1 SaaS company   Our team will review your application and will be in touch if your application is shortlisted to the next stage. If you do not hear from us in 30 days, we will keep your resume on file in case a relevant opportunity opens up. We wish you the best. Have a great day

title: Database Administrator (for AMAAN Project)
description: Responsibilities: You will be responsible for implementation, configuration, maintenance, and performance of system health for high-concurrency PostgreSQL database systems ensuring the availability and consistent performance, supporting product development teams. Specific experience in complex large data architectures using Alibaba Cloud RDS PostgreSQL or AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL with KMS key encryption. knowlege in data lake analytics will be a plus Resolve database performance and scalability issues and implement performance tuning and optimization (PTO), using native monitoring and troubleshooting tools. Design and implement scalable database schemas and configurations, File system layout, physical partitioning, sharding and replication, incremental backups, restores, and recovery models. Implement High Availability (HA) and Disaster Recovery (DR) options for PostgreSQL Develop DevOps policies and procedures as it relates to PostgreSQL Manage PostgreSQL databases through multiple product lifecycle environments, from development to mission-critical production systems dealing with upgrades. Independently analyzes, solves, and corrects issues in real-time, providing problem resolution end-to-end. Refines and automates regular processes, tracks issues, and documents changes. Assists developers with complex query tuning and schema refinement. Provides on-call support, as part of team rotation, for critical production systems. Performs pre-scheduled maintenance and support release deployment activities after hours. Shares domain and technical expertise, providing technical mentorship and cross-training to other peers and team members. Design and implement a complex system to combine and merge data from multiple database servers into a target database. Create complex queries to produce materialized views collating data from multiple servers based on which server is deemed authoritative for each record. Tune performance of source and target servers to ensure performance is maintained even after replication/merge engine is added.  Experience: Strong experience with PostgreSQL and it has been your primary database for a minimum of 3-5 years. Deep understanding of systems performance of PostgreSQL, and advanced knowledge of Postgres internals Understand automation concepts to speed up the work using terraform or another infrastructure language Experienced implementing high availability by setting up either streaming replication or logical replication and decoding Expertise implementing Foreign Data Wrappers to sync data across multiple PostgreSQL servers and Advanced query tuning for large data sets Knows how to optimize queries/schemas and backup solutions and strategies Knows HA solutions and strategies Knows proxy usage as it relates to Postgres Able to troubleshoot methodically, identifying and applying fixes for known errors, and when necessary, capacity to think outside of the box to resolve complex issues Experienced with system performance counters and metrics relevant to the operation of high-concurrency PostgreSQL implementations, and resolve database performance and scalability issues. This description portrays in general terms the type and level(s) of work performed and is not intended to be all-inclusive, nor the specific duties of any one incumbent.

title: Database Administrator
description: We are looking a technically capable Database Administrator who has previous experience working in a position of great responsibility. In this role, you will be the key contact for any database issues that arise.  Responsible for the maintenance and management of company databases while adhering and contributing to and contributing data management and governance policies, including DRP (Disaster Recovery Plan) and Data Validation.  RESPONSIBILITIES: Monitor and report the system’s performance, while identifying potential issues. Safeguard existing data against unauthorised access. Share suggestions for changes and improvements. Knowledge sharing with other team members.  REQUIREMENTS: Possess a B.Sc. in related major. Knowledgeable in cloud data platforms and databases, including MySQL, Postgres, Spark, HDFS, and NoSQL. Analytical mindset with great problem solving abilities. Excellent verbal and written communication skills. Capable of working under pressure. Updated with latest developments and trends in data platforms. Excellent understanding in Google Cloud Computing is an advantage. Experienced in data modeling and architecture is a big plus.

description: Ensure all the requirements (configuration, availability, etc.) for the production database used by Jalin  Access control and data integrity to ensure the security and reliability of the database production  Designing capacity planning and implementing database requirements  Minimize downtime, provide reactive and proactive support for databases  Conduct periodic testing and evaluation for Database including disaster recovery (DRP)  Monitor database performance, implement changes and implement improvements as needed  Doing documentation for procedures, policies and changes to the database used by Jalin Minimum Bachelor Degree in Information Technology or Equivalent, from reputable university  Having minimum 5 years of experience in same field and fintech company would be preferable  Strong analytical and planning skills  Hands on in Database Design, SQL, Database Operational, and security  Excellent problem-solving skills  Good communication in English both oral and written  Willing to be located in Jakarta and BSD area

title: (Junior/Senior) IT System Administrator
description: Company Overview: A leading one-stop, global Human Resource service provider, BIPO helps companies scale-up their HR operations with ease. Our award-winning cloud and mobile-based Human Resource Management System (HRMS) platform simplifies complicated HR processes. We understand companies need to stay agile, efficient, and cost-effective. That is why we have designed a comprehensive suite of HR solutions – Payroll Outsourcing, Attendance Automation, HR Consulting, Recruitment & Business Process Outsourcing, Flexible Employee Management – to help digitise and transform HR. Since 2004, we have built an extensive network spanning globally, spanning across 16 countries (and growing). To date, we have served 1,600+ clients, servicing 230,000+ headcounts, in over 12+ industries. Overall, our global reach means we can serve your needs in a more targeted and effective manner! The incumbent will be based in Jakarta but reporting to the IT Infrastructure Manager based in Singapore. The role expectation is to support HRMS solutions on cloud environment. Key Responsibilities: Implement and support HRMS on AWS, Aliyun or any other cloud provider Ensure the availability, performance, scalability, and security of cloud infrastructure Ensure system monitoring and antivirus alerts are timely handed Perform periodic activities to support IT compliance (e.g., monthly backup and restore, vulnerabilities scan) Perform periodic HRMS upgrade during non-office hours Provide technical support to client pertaining to IT Infrastructure for HRMS Provide local end-user and office IT support on end-user daily technical issue Lead completion of assigned IT projects / task within timeline Adhere to IT policy and procedure Requirements: Open to candidates already based in Jakarta. Candidates who are not based in Jakarta but planning to relocate to Jakarta at own cost before start date are also welcome to apply. Able to communicate in English and with strong interpersonal skills (can interact with all level of staffs) Diploma or Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology / equivalent field of study Minimally 2 years of implementing and supporting solution on cloud environment Good knowledge on Cloud computing (AWS and Aliyun), web application platform (IIS web server, DNS), system administration (Windows server, Active Directory, SSO) and network administration (VPC, routing) Relevant experience in SQL, RDS, Cloud IAM and Security Group Relevant experience in handling system and security alerts Willing to work non-office hours as required and be contactable when critical issue occurs during non-office hours Good troubleshooting / analytical skills with process-improvement mindset Good project management experience and documentation skills Job Type: Full-time Salary: Rp5,000,000 - Rp11,000,000 per month Ability to commute/relocate: Jakarta: Reliably commute or planning to relocate before starting work (Required) Application Question(s): How many years of hands-on experience do you have on supporting web application? How many years of hands-on experience do you have on supporting cloud environment? Do you have hands-on experience supporting Database server? (Yes/No) Experience: Implementing or supporting solutions hosted on cloud server: 1 year (Preferred) Language: English (Required)

title: Windows System Administrator
description: System Administrator Assist in overseeing trouble ticket queues and resolve issues that our Tier1 support team is unable to resolve. Job Descriptions Create and maintain necessary tools to monitor our network and ensure 100% Network uptime and delivery. Responsible for troubleshooting and maintenance of wide array of servers and network related services such as physical & hardware layer, web /mail / dns / database services, routing / switching / load balancing / firewall devices. Assist in overseeing trouble ticket queues and resolve issues that our Tier1 support team is unable to resolve. Qualification Candidate must possess at least Bachelor's Degree in Engineering (Computer/Telecommunication), Computer Science/Information Technology or equivalent. At least 3 Year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position. Preferably Staff (non-management & non-supervisor) specialized in IT/Computer - Network/System/Database Admin or equivalent. Have knowledge of Windows-based operating system such as Windows Server 2008/2008R2, Windows Server 2012/2012R2, Windows Server 2016, and Windows 7/8/8.1/10. Have a strong knowledge with Active Directory, various web server technologies such as IIS, ARR (Application Request Routing), PHP, NLB. Experienced with setting up highly scalable and highly available Microsoft database infrastructure such as SQL Server Strong knowledge with Hyper-V Virtualization technologies Experienced in managing and operating backup solutions, such as System Center Data Protection Manager, Veeam Backup & Replication, Acronis Cloud Have a strong knowledge in TCP/IP stack, Subnetting, DNS Working experience with Network appliances and networking devices such as Cisco ASA, Cisco Catalyst, Force10 Switches, KEMP Load Balancer, Coyotepoint load balancer, Sonicwall/Watchguard/Juniper/Fortinet appliances is a big plus

title: MS Engineer
description: At NTT we believe that by using innovative technology we can solve global challenges and create a world that is sustainable and secure. We are looking for curious people, from diverse backgrounds, that are keen to work in a fast-paced and agile environment.  At NTT we trust our employees to do the right thing, even when no one is watching, which is why we offer flexibility in the workplace. The majority of our roles are hybrid, meaning we encourage a balance of working from home and our local office. Ask our recruitment team if this is a hybrid role. Want to be a part of our team? Performs IT functions such as design, analysis, evaluation, testing, debugging and implementation of applications programs supporting the company infrastructure business processes and operations and/or network-based (cloud) product systems. Analyzes, installs, acquires, modifies and supports operating systems, database or utilities software. Plans, conducts and directs the analysis of business problems with automated systems solutions. Analyzes, designs, acquires and implements projects for LAN and/or WAN systems. Plans, designs, acquires and implements telecommunications voice/wire systems. At higher job levels, may contribute to the development, testing, evaluation or design of system or infrastructure architecture used throughout the IT solution set. Working at NTT The MS Engineer (L1) is responsible for providing a managed service to clients to ensure that their IT infrastructure and systems remain operational through proactively identifying, investigating and resolving technical incidents and problems and to restore service to clients by managing incidents to resolution. Their primary objective is to ensure zero missed service level agreement conditions. The MS Engineer (L1) focuses on first line support for standard and low complexity incidents and service requests.  Key Roles and Responsibilities: Monitors client infrastructure and solutions Identify problems and errors prior to or when they occur Routinely identify common incidents and opportunities for avoidance as well as general opportunities for incident reduction Investigate first line incidents assigned and identify the root cause of incidents and problems Fulfil approved requests following agreed procedures Provide telephonic or chat support to clients when required Execute approved maintenance activities including patching and configuration changes Follow the required handover procedures for shift changes to ensure service continuity Report and escalate incidents where necessary Ensure the efficient and comprehensive resolutions of incidents and requests Proactively identify opportunities for work optimisation Update existing knowledge articles or create new ones Identify opportunities for work optimisation including opportunities for automation of work, request fulfilment, incident resolution and other general process improvement opportunities.  Knowledge, Skills and Attributes: Ability to communicate and work across different cultures and social groups Ability to plans activities and projects well in advance, and takes into account possible changing circumstances Ability to maintain a positive outlook at work Ability to work well in a pressurised environment Ability to work hard and put in longer hours when it is necessary Ability to apply active listening techniques such as paraphrasing the message to confirm understanding, probing for further relevant information and refraining from interrupting Ability to adapt to changing circumstances Ability to place client at the forefront of all interactions, understanding their requirements and creating a positive client experience throughout the total client journey  Academic Qualifications Diploma, degree or relevant qualification in IT/Computing (or demonstrated equivalent work experience)  Advantageous certifications: Up to date and relevant ITIL certification (Foundation Level) Cisco Certified Network Associate - Routing and Switching (CCNA-R/S) Cisco Certified Network Associate - Wireless (CCNA-WL) Riverbed Certified Solutions Associate - WAN Optimization (RCSA-W) Cisco Certified Network Associate - Security (CCNA-SEC) Check Point Certified Security Administrator (CCSA) Check Point Certified Security Administrator NG with Application Intelligence (CCSA-NG AI) VMware Certified Professional vSphere IP, WINS, DHCP, DNC, etc MS-Office, MS-Outlook, Symantec Backup Exec, Symantec EndPoint Protection, Symantec System Recovery, Citrix Go-To-Assist MS-Active Directory MS-Windows Server MS-Windows XP Professional MS-Windows Terminal Server MS-Exchange Server MS-SQL Server MS-IIS Server Citrix Metaframe Switches and Routers SonicWall Firewalls and SSL VPN Security Appliances Cisco Firewalls and Routers Cisco Certified Network Associate - Data Center (CCNA-DC) MCSA+VCP, RHCE or equivalent Cisco Certified Network Associate - Video (CCNA-VID) Cisco Certified Network Associate - Voice (CCNA-V)  Additional certifications Cisco Certified Network Professional - Routing and Switching (CCNP-R/S) Cisco Certified Network Professional - Wireless (CCNP-W) Cisco Certified Network Professional - Security Check Point Certified Security Expert (CCSE) Certified Partner SE - Security Cisco Certified Network Professional - Data Center (CCNP-DC) Blue Coat Certified Proxy SG Professional Cisco Certified Network Professional - Voice (CCNP-V)  Any of the above certifications is a plus. The MS – Services Engineer (L1) is expected to gain certifications relevant to services supported. Certifications carry additional weight on candidate’s qualification for the role.  Required Experience: Entry level experience or completion of relevant intern program Entry level experience with troubleshooting and providing support required in network/ data centre/ systems/ storage administration and monitoring Services within a medium to large ICT organisation. Working knowledge of management agent, redundancy concepts, and products within the supported technical domain (i.e. Network, Data Center, Telephony, Exchange, Storage, Cloud, Backup etc) What will make you a good fit for the role? Standard career level descriptor for job level:  Develops professional experience Applies policy and procedures to solve variety of issues Problems are moderate in nature Build productive internal and external working relationships Receives general instructions on routine work Receives detailed instructions on new work Typically needs a Bachelor’s or equivalent and entry or basic level experience; or an advanced or equivalent degree without experience; or equivalent work experience Join our growing global team and accelerate your career with us. Apply today. Equal opportunity employer NTT is proud to be an equal opportunity employer with a global culture that embraces diversity. We are committed to providing an environment free of unfair discrimination and harassment. We do not discriminate based on age, race, color, sex, religion, national origin, disability, pregnancy, marital status, sexual orientation, gender reassignment, veteran status, or other protected category.

title: System Administrator
description: This position of System Administrator is ideal for a Linux Engineer keen on learning new things in the field of System and Network administration. The person is expected to work and achieve results in a highly knowledgeable and cooperative team in contact with our international clients and partners. As a System Administrator, we expect the person to support the server designs and IT network system and to be responsible for its implementation. Responsibilities Plan, develop, implement, analyzes, maintains and supports the 1rstWAP servers and IT network systems, Provide specialized technical assistance in defining server designs, Implements solutions and strategies. Requirements Advanced Linux Administration Knowledge (CentOS/RedHat/Ubuntu), Web server administration (Apache/Jboss/Nginx), Email server administration, Knowledge and experience in OpenLDAP or Karberos and Radius implementation, Virtualization and managing virtual machine (Proxmox/RedHat virtualization environment), Database experience, database clustering, replication and optimization, Hands on experience in Perl/Bash or Python scripting, IT Security knowledge in Linux Firewall, Cisco ASA or PaloAlto, Experience with HIDS implementation (OSSEC/Samhain/Tripwire), Experience with opensource penetration test tools, Routing and switching experience (Cisco/Mikrotik), Familiarity with opensource tools, monitoring system, hardware troubleshoot and system backup (Cisco/Mikrotik), Working exposure to networked storage (SAN/NAS) concepts, Knowledge of SS7 and GSM network concepts will be higly regarded, Knowledge and experience in managing small team will be highly regarded, Self motivated, and ability to work overtime. We Offer A competitive remuneration package with social benefits, Additional family health insurance, Training and professional development, Career path in a rapidly growing company, Skilled co-workers to share experience with, A friendly and non-conflict working environment, Retirement Plan.   PT FIRST WAP INTERNATIONAL is a global leading company in digital, location & mobile advertising solutions with more than 17 years experience in the finance & banking, insurance manufacture, hotel, education and government segments. Our main office is located in  PT FIRST WAP INTERNATIONAL Millennium Centennial Center, 3rd Floor Jl. title: Market & Partnership Executive
description: Job Description A. Partners Acquisition Ensure all required partners record information are available both in physical (hard copy) and electronic (soft copy) format Conduct filing of all partners records information in the corresponding repository with accurate retention procedure B. Team player, motivated and enjoys to work in e-travel and hospitality. Flexible and quickly adapt to the latest guidelines/changes on the policy and procedure.

title: System Administrator

title: SAS 9.3/9.4 Administrator (Working in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia)
company: Mission Consultancy Services Malaysia SDN BHD
description: Persyaratan  QUALIFICATIONS : 5+ years of hands-on experience as a SAS Administrator for a multi-tier SAS Platform in a Linux and Windows environment  Hands-on experience on SAS 9.3, SAS 9.4 GRID Administration having SAS Metadata Server, SAS Application server, SAS Object spawner, SAS Connect server, SAS Olap server, AS Connect server, SAS Content server.  Having good experience in working on Linux environment and Linux commands.  Experience in working on SAS standalone and GRID having multiple node GRID Environment.  Excellent knowledge of SAS Enterprise server platform using SAS Management Console.  Good installation and configuration of SAS Metadata Server, SAS Application Server and Mid-tier server.  Extensive install, configure and support experience in SAS/Access interface to Oracle, MS-SQL Server, Teradata and Hadoop.  Excellent experience in troubleshooting issues related to SAS Enterprise guide, SAS Enterprise miner, SAS DI studio and other SAS components.  Experience in migrations and user migration from old server to new server.  Experience in applying hot fixes on the SAS Components.  Excellent knowledge on SAS license Renewals.  Excellent knowledge in USERS, GROUPS AND LIBRARIES creation.  Good knowledge on client web-based applications like sas studio and sas web report studio.  Excellent support to analytics groups for all the issues related to connecting SAS Servers using SAS Components.  Good hands –on experience in dealing with SAS server restarts.  Good hands on experience in dealing with SAS Webservers hosting various SAS applications  Advanced knowledge of Base SAS, SQL, and the SAS macro language (at the SAS Certified Advanced Programmer level)  Experience with data quality, data management, and ETL  Banking or Financial Services Experience Preferred  BS in Computer Science, Economics, Statistics, Math or related fields  Tanggung Jawab Job description  Mission Consultancy Services Malaysia is looking for an experienced SAS 9.3/9.4 administrator and technical expert in installation, configuration, and maintenance of SAS Enterprise BI Server and also provide End User Support for various SAS products (SAS EBI, EM, EDM or ESP) and also liaise with the In Country and Regional SAS support teams . This position is for one of our clients which is one of the largest Malaysian Commercial Bank and you will be working in Bank’s premises, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.  JOB ROLE The SAS Platform Administrator/Architect will be responsible for providing overall SAS platform Architecture and Administrative support. Primary duties include maintenance, enhancements installation and support quick architecture changes for SAS Products (EBI, EM, ESP, EG). Also includes providing SAS platform security management, SAS application and underlying infrastructure support and ensuring processes are aligned and complaint with internal policies as well as regulatory requirements. PRIMARY RESPONSIBILITIES  Routine administration, monitoring, maintenance, and tuning of the SAS Enterprise BI server (9.3/9.4) Platform and knowledge in SAS applications (SAS EBI, EM, EDM or ESP)  Hands on experience in supporting for SAS maintenance, installation, upgrades, user support, resolving technical issues, working with SAS technical support team, Internal IT and provided technical support to operation team for automation and deployment of solutions.  Provide leadership and direction with respect to architecture, design, and implementation for the SAS Platform  Design solutions to reduce the operational and management complexity of the platform and to increase reliability and performance  Perform new installations and upgrades as needed and routinely apply hot fixes  Design, implement, and maintain platform security through SAS metadata and Windows OS  Manage automated job scheduling  Perform platform capacity planning  Lead efforts to provide SAS technical and programming support to users Collaborate with IT and database administrators to support ongoing operations  Disclaimer: melamar pekerjaan di Karir.com tidak dipungut biaya

title: Sales Administrator
description: About Syngenta Syngenta is a leading agriculture company helping to improve global food security by enabling millions of farmers to make better use of available resources. Through world class science and innovative crop solutions, our 28,000 people in over 90 countries are working to transform how crops are grown. We are committed to rescuing land from degradation, enhancing biodiversity and revitalizing rural communities.  About this job: Manage the day-to-day activities of the SBU administration so that organisation's SBU team is effectively supported and all administration works are processed efficiently, accurately and economically. Monitor the status of administration works to identify problem areas and adapt and propose procedures to improve the overall administration performance of the team.  Accountabilities: Responsible for compiling, updating, managing and supporting all administration works across SBU such as sales and program contract, asset database, capex and logistics, proposal and report documents, correspondence letters and maintenance agreements. As liaison center between SBU Leadership and regional team and customers : Answering internal and external enquiries on products availibility, prices, delivery time and the status of orders so that enquiries are dealt with promptly and accurately. Communicate with staffs in SBU to confirm the status of orders (including RBF processing), expenses / business advance and other administration aspects. Supervise the supporting and administrating activities in each region in SBU so that all administration activities across SBU are completed accurately and on time. Manage and update staffs and deployment database. Collaborate with RSA in providing all administrative data from regions. You will bring the following essential knowledge & experience: Bachelor degree of Reputable University from any major. Minimal 2 - 3 years of related working experience. Familiar working with PO, agreement, varous report. Excellent excel skill, good in data and analysis. Good communication skills (English, negotiation and influencing skills). In Syngenta we recognize that diversity and inclusion is important to our business. We embrace the unique perspective and capabilities of our employees, which will help us continue to drive innovation and achieve our business goals. Our culture enables us to create an environment of involvement, respect and connection with the communities where we operate – benefitting individual employees and the company.  Additional Information: Location: Cilandak, South Jakarta, Indonesia. Full-time position.

title: DATABASE ADMINISTRATOR – Entertainment Platform, Jakarta
description: Parrish & Co. is an executive search, recruitment and headhunting firm for corporations and fast-growing companies in Jakarta, Indonesia. Meet our consultants, discover our executive approach and best commitment to provide a perfect solution to your recruitment activities. Responsibilities: DBA will keep the database up and running smoothly 24/7. The goal is to provide a seamless flow of information throughout the company, considering both backend data structure and frontend accessibility for end-users. Create and maintain all databases required for development, testing and production usage. Analysing applications, programming, and operations; evaluating existing systems and designing proposed systems. Plan and implements backup and recovery of the production database. Controls migrations of programs, database changes, reference data changes and menu changes through the development life cycle. Recommends solutions by defining database physical structure and functional capabilities, database security, data back-up, and recovery specifications. Installs revised or new systems by proposing specifications and flowcharts; recommending optimum access techniques; coordinating installation requirements. Monitoring and maintain database performance by calculating optimum values for database parameters; implementing new releases; completing maintenance requirements; evaluating operating systems and hardware products. Supports database functions by designing and coding utilities. Maintains quality service by establishing and enforcing organization standards. Provide regular report of all database performance. Requirements: You are a Bachelor’s degree in computer discipline or relevant certification Proven working experience for min. 2 years as DBA or related field Excellent English skills. Hands-on experience with database standards and end user applications Excellent knowledge of data backup, recovery, security, integrity and SQL Strong knowledge and experienced with SQL and relational database required (PostgreSQL, MongoDB, NoSQL) Familiarity with database design, documentation and coding Problem solving skills and analytical thinking skills Good communication skills with development teams and system administrators Extra Requirement: Have worked in E-Commerce, FinTech industry Have good skills in all PostgreSQL tools and backup tools Experienced with reporting/BI tools is an advantage   Job Features Job Category Entertainment Platform

title: Senior System Engineer
description: Vox Teneo is a human sized web application development and MSP, located in Bandung, specialized in web solutions for worldwide customers. We are looking for a proficient Cloud Engineer and System Administrator. General Requirements Candidate must possess at least Bachelor's Degree in Engineering (Computer/Telecommunication), Computer Science/Information Technology or equivalent. At least 5 Year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position. Required Skill(s): Azure, DevOps, VMware, apache, nginx, Linux, debian, Ubuntu, Windows OS, VPN, Docker, Kubernetes, Router, Network Security Preferably Supervisor/Coordinator specialized in IT/Computer - Network/System/Database Admin or equivalent. Main Responsibilities Provision and configure IAAS and PAAS resources in Microsoft Azure supporting web applications developed in Open Source and Microsoft technologies. Consult and deliver client cloud migration projects. Manage, maintain and support production infrastructure and systems for external clients. Support of development teams for resources, configurations and deployments. Production infrastructure incident support. Implement and monitor disaster recovery and business continuity. Create documentation for production support and process/configuration standards. Evolution of automation processes and systems (Jenkins, AzureDevOps). Support and coach junior members of the team. Collaborate with geo-located internal teams and external clients. Profile IT Bachelor’s Degree or Master Degree or experience equivalent. At least 5 year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position. Applicants must be willing to work in Bandung. Strong IT operations and engineering background. Ability to work independently as well as with a team. Highly organized with a proven ability to prioritize workload, meet deadlines, manage several complex projects at one time, and utilize time effectively. Ability to Multi-Task and be resourceful. Strong communication and organization skills. Ability to communicate to all level of the business. High proficiency in English. Required Skills Experience with Open Source web servers and reverse-proxy (Apache, Nginx, HA Proxy) Skills in Linux and Microsoft operating systems (Debian, Ubuntu, Windows) Good knowledge of networking, routing, VPNs (IPSec, OpenVPN, PPTP protocols) Working experience with Docker and Kubernetes Proven experience in Azure Virtualization experience (VMWare) Basic knowledge of database servers (MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB) Basic scripting skills (Bash, Python) Knowledge of network monitoring and tools Experience with automation tools such as Ansible, Jenkins, Azure DevOps Competent with mainstream office automation, project management, and communications tools. Beneficial Skills Experience with Windows environment (Windows, IIS, MS SQL) AWS Experience Infrastructure as a code experience (Terraform) Elastic Stack Experience with backup client/server software apply now

title: IT Trainee
description: Tentang Pekerjaan Perkembangan teknologi yang kian pesat merupakan salah satu tantangan yang harus dihadapi oleh semua perusahaan di Indonesia, termasuk BCA. Menjawab tantangan ini, BCA terus mengedepankan inovasi agar dapat senantiasa menjadi bank yang dapat diandalkan oleh masyarakat. Inovasi yang dilakukan BCA selama ini membutuhkan dukungan dari semua pihak terutama bagian IT.  Untuk mempersiapkan tenaga profesional di bidang IT, BCA secara spesifik merancang sebuah program bagi lulusan Ilmu Komputer yang disebut sebagai BCA IT Trainee. Peserta BCA IT Trainee akan mengikuti pelatihan selama 6,5 bulan di BCA. Lulusan program ini akan diangkat langsung menjadi karyawan tetap dan ditempatkan di Divisi IT BCA. Selama pelatihan, peserta akan mendapatkan uang saku, jaminan kesehatan, tunjangan hari raya, tunjangan akhir tahun dan tentunya pelatihan yang berkualitas dari BCA.  Program BCA IT Trainee terbuka untuk lowongan berikut: Application Developer Backend Developer Data Specialist Database Administrator DevOps Engineer IT Security Specialist IT System Infrastructure Engineer Mainframe Developer Network Engineer    Persyaratan Min. Sarjana S1 degan IPK Min. 3,00 Memiliki latar belakang pendidikan dari jurusan Teknik Informatika / Sistem Informasi / Teknik Komputer / Statistik / Fisika / Matematika / Teknik Industri / Teknik Mesin / Teknik Elektro Memiliki pengetahuan dasar dan ketertarikan di bidang IT Memiliki pengalaman bekerja di bidang teknologi (IT) menjadi nilai tambah Usia maks. 24 tahun (Strata 1) dan 26 tahun (Strata 2) Bersedia tidak menikah selama 6,5 bulan masa pendidikan Bersedia menjalani ikatan dinas setelah pendidikan Penempatan di Kantor Pusat (Jakarta / Tangerang) Tahapan Seleksi Seleksi Administrasi Tes Online Tes Psikologi Wawancara Rekrutmen Wawancara User Tes Kesehatan Informasi Tambahan Sekilas tentang PT Bank Central Asia Tbk Berdiri sejak 1957, kami hadir di tengah masyarakat Indonesia dan tumbuh menjadi salah satu bank terbesar di Indonesia. Kami tak pernah berhenti menawarkan beragam solusi perbankan yang menjawab kebutuhan finansial nasabah dari berbagai kalangan. BCA terus bertumbuh dengan puluhan ribu karyawan yang tersebar di berbagai kantor BCA di seluruh Indonesia. Kami sadar bahwa sumber daya manusia merupakan salah satu kunci keberhasilan kami untuk terus menjaga kepercayaan dari para nasabah. Untuk itu kami selalu berusaha untuk menciptakan lingkungan kerja yang suportif dan nyaman serta selalu mendukung karyawan untuk terus berkembang dan memperluas keterampilan yang dimiliki. Tanggal Pendaftaran 01 December 2021 - 31 December 2022 Batas Usia 17 - 26 Tahun Lokasi Tes Jakarta Lokasi Penempatan Banten Jakarta

title: Oracle DBA Consultant
description: At NTT we believe that by using innovative technology we can solve global challenges and create a world that is sustainable and secure. We are looking for curious people, from diverse backgrounds, that are keen to work in a fast-paced and agile environment.  At NTT we trust our employees to do the right thing, even when no one is watching, which is why we offer flexibility in the workplace. The majority of our roles are hybrid, meaning we encourage a balance of working from home and our local office. Ask our recruitment team if this is a hybrid role. Want to be a part of our team? Performs IT functions such as design, analysis, evaluation, testing, debugging, and implementation of applications programs supporting the company infrastructure business processes and operations and/or network-based (cloud) product systems.  Analyzes, installs, acquires, modifies, and supports operating systems, databases, or utilities software. Plans, conducts, and directs the analysis of business problems with automated systems solutions. Analyzes, designs, acquires, and implements projects for LAN and/or WAN systems. Plans, designs, acquires, and implements telecommunications voice/wire systems.  At higher job levels, may contribute to the development, testing, evaluation, or design of system or infrastructure architecture used throughout the IT solution set. Working at NTT Key Roles and Responsibilities: Database monitoring and Maintenance Monitors database infrastructure Proactively monitors the work queues. Perform operational tasks to resolve all incidents/requests in a timely manner and within the agreed SLA. Perform Proactive Performance Monitoring and provide applicable suggestions Update tickets with resolution tasks performed Identify, Investigate, analyze issues and errors prior to or when they occur, and log all such incidents in a timely manner. Capture all required and relevant information for immediate resolution Provide Level 1 support to all incidents, requests and escalate to L2 support in case of problems Communicate with other teams and clients for extending support Execute changes with clear identification of risks and mitigation plans to be captured into the change record Follow the shift handover process highlighting any key tickets to be focussed on along with a handover of upcoming critical tasks to be carried out in the next shift Escalate all tickets to seek the right focus from CoE and other teams, if needed continue the escalations to management Work with automation teams for effort optimization and automating routine tasks Establish monitoring for client databases Identify problems and errors before they impact a client’s service Contribute to the change management process by logging all change requests with complete details for standard and non-standard including patching and any other changes to Configuration Items. Ensures all changes are carried out with proper change approvals Plan and execute approved maintenance activities Audit and analyze incident and request tickets for quality and recommends improvements with updates to knowledge articles. Produce trend analysis reports for identifying tasks for automation, leading to a reduction in tickets and optimization of effort Knowledge, Skills and Attributes: Required to have knowledge of Database Administration in Oracle Must have been an Oracle Database Administrator for at least 6 months to 1 year Knowledge of handling SQL Server / MySQL / Postgresql / MongoDB / Redis / Cassandra / Other databases would be advantageous Significant advantage for candidates with relevant or advanced knowledge Knowledge in Cloud Environment, Microservices architecture would be advantageous Knowledge of DevOps and CI/CD pipelines would be preferred Ability to communicate and work across different cultures and social groups Ability to maintain a positive outlook at work Ability to work well in a pressurised environment Ability to work hard and put in longer hours when it is necessary Ability to apply active listening techniques such as paraphrasing the message to confirm understanding, probing for further relevant information and refraining from interrupting Ability to adapt to changing circumstances Ability to place client at the forefront of all interactions, understanding their requirements and creating a positive client experience throughout the total client journey Academic Qualifications Diploma, degree or relevant qualification in IT/Computing (or demonstrated equivalent work experience) Advantageous certifications: Oracle Database Administrator Associate/Professional MySQL Database Administrator Associate/Professional PostgreSQL / EDB Administration MongoDB / Redis / Cassandra / Other related Database Certification Up to date and relevant ITIL certification Additional certifications Cloud Trainings and Certifications Relevant Software Trainings and Certifications Required Experience: Minimum 6 months of experience in handling Oracle Database Technologies Must have worked with Maintenance and Monitoring of Oracle Databases Good to have experience in Installation, Implementation, Disaster Recovery Setup, Monitoring Tools Setup, Backup/Recovery, Migration and High Availability Configuration Setup Moderate managed services experience Moderate level knowledge in ticketing tools What will make you a good fit for the role? Standard career level descriptor for job level:  Develops professional experience Applies policy and procedures to solve variety of issues Problems are moderate in nature Build productive internal and external working relationships Receives general instructions on routine work Receives detailed instructions on new work Typically needs a Bachelor’s or equivalent and entry or basic level experience; or an advanced or equivalent degree without experience; or equivalent work experience Join our growing global team and accelerate your career with us. Apply today. Equal opportunity employer NTT is proud to be an equal opportunity employer with a global culture that embraces diversity. We are committed to providing an environment free of unfair discrimination and harassment. We do not discriminate based on age, race, color, sex, religion, national origin, disability, pregnancy, marital status, sexual orientation, gender reassignment, veteran status, or other protected category.

title: DBA Junior Level
description: Kualifikasi: S1 Teknik Berpengalaman sebagai Oracle Database Administrator Associate Level; Mampu melakukan hardware sizing; Menguasai, mampu menganalisis dan menyelesaikan permasalahan serta melakukan Improvement database Oracle MES Flat Product PSI Metals pada bidang-bidang berikut namun tidak terbatas pada: Oracle System Management, System Architecture & Landscape Planning & Deployment, Upgrades/Migrations, Software Correction Support (Notes, Support Packages), Database Setup (Installation, Post-Installation, Tuning, dll), Backup dan restore system dan data; Mengerti dan memahami (tidak terbatas hanya pada): Database Design, RDBMS, Structure mis. Client-server Architecture, Operating System (Linux, Windows dll), teknologi Storage dan Networking; Perawatan rutin database, recovery, dan penanganan insiden database.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Hands-on experience in deploying and maintaining Infrastructure & Apps.  Managing day-to-day operations and administer cloud and on-prem infrastructure & security configuration to deliver highly available and scalable services.  Setup and maintain Infrastructure and Application monitoring based on KPIs and reporting on periodic and ad hoc basis to management.  Setting up new DevOps tools (Git, CI/CD, etc) and infrastructure.  Hands-on experience in building automated deployment and config management to minimize manual intervention and to meet security and compliance objectives.  Implement cloud-based Infrastructure for new projects for data analytics, web portals, and mobile applications.  Be responsible over the readiness and stability of our systems.  Create and maintain cloud-based infrastructure.  Support and troubleshoot product and infrastructure issues in production environments.  Provide on-call support and monitor the production environment on a rotational basis (the team provides support 24/7). Bachelor Degree in Computer Science / Information Technology or related major from reputable university  At least 2 year of experience using Kubernetes, Chef, or any scripting language  At least 2 years of experience as a UNIX / LINUX administrator  At least 2 years of experience managing database / application / middleware servers  Minimum 3 year of hands-on experience on container and orchestration technologies (Docker, Kubernetes, etc)  Good exposure to DevOps technologies and tools such as Splunk, Nagios, Ansible, Chef, Puppet, Kubernetes, Docker, Jenkins, Git.  Good knowledge of Agile DevOps principles and Infrastructure as Code Concepts.  Experience in Golang, Grafana, and Graylog is a plus  Familiar with CI-CD tool-chain and have work experience with knowledge of config and administration of tools in the tool-chain  Excellent teamworking and communication skills  Strong attention to detail.

title: Junior Business Intelligence
description: Job Description : - Identify and support opportunities to improve and streamline processes regarding data flow and data quality to improve data accuracy, completeness and value - Support advanced modelling data requests and ad-hoc requests as and when required - Gather requirements, managing expectations on delivery and capabilities - Support knowledge transfer with well defined documentation - Supports both application and technical assistance on tool's functionality. - Hands on ability for analysis, design, develop, test, train and implement either remotely or on-site around the region Requirements : - BS in Business Analytics, Computer Science, Information Systems Management, Engineering or equivalent disciplines - Effective communication skills (verbal and written), documentations skills, interpersonal skills, and problem-solving skills. - Ability to adhere to deadlines and manage multiple tasks at one time - High attention to detail - Ability to learn new skills and systems - Knowledge in Microsoft Azure Environment and BI Tools is a plus - Knowledge in PowerBI and OBIEE, Tableau is a plus - Knowledge in programming languages such as SQL, C, Python, R - Experience in business intelligence software such as QlikView/ QlikSense is a plus - Strong analytical and problem-solving skill - Exceptional verbal and written communication skills - Fluency in English, both written and spoken Job Type: Contract Contract length: 12 months Salary: Rp6,500,000 - Rp9,000,000 per month Ability to commute/relocate: DKI Jakarta: Reliably commute or willing to relocate with an employer-provided relocation package (Required) Education: S1 (Required)

title: Business Intelligence
description: Develop and manage BI solutions;  Collaborate with business users;  Analyze business processes and requirements;  Participation in data warehouse design;  Identify opportunities to improve processes and strategies with technology solutions;  Identify development needs in order to improve and streamline operations Strong analytical and planning skills;  Good communication and presentation skills;  Excellent problem-solving skills;  Have experience as Bi developer 2- 5 Years;  Capable using SSIS, SSAS, SSRS or Tableau

title: Senior Business Intelligence
description: Job Overview BI typically handles analysis and data modeling design using data collected in a centralized data warehouse or multiple databases throughout the organization. It’s a role that combines hard skills like programming, data modeling and statistics with soft skills like communication, analytical thinking and problem-solving. Candidates need a well-rounded background to balance the line between technology and the business.   Your main duties in flying with us: Analyze the structure of a business, how it uses technology, what its goals and pain points are that can be improved through BI tools Collect, analyze, and share data to help business teams drive improvement in key business metrics, customer experience, and business results Utilize database and web application technologies to design and evaluate innovative business intelligence tools and automated reports Design, develop, and test BI solutions such as databases, data warehouses, queries, views, reports, and dashboards Perform data conversions, imports, and exports of data within and between internal and external software systems Enhance the performance of business intelligence tools by defining data to filter and indexes Design and deliver end-user training and training materials Train users to transform data into action-oriented information and to use that information correctly Document new and existing models, solutions, and implementations Mandatory belongings that you must prepare: At the minimum have 4 years of experience as a Business Intelligence Experience working with one or more language for querying (e.g. SQL) Familiar with advanced analytics languages like Python is a plus Experience working with multiple stakeholders across various divisions Ability to make inferences from data and devise an appropriate course of actions Comfortable working with large data sets and numbers   Skills Requirements Critical Thinking Analytical Skill Python Sql Data Warehousing Tableau R Google Data Studio ETL Statitstics

title: Business Intelligence
description: If you consider yourself to be smart, driven and ambitious you should strongly consider applying for a role as Business Intelligence in Indonesia's fastest growing e-commerce company, Shopee. Job Description: Assisting the various business units as a discussion partner to plan, strategise, and grow Shopee's business by enabling data-driven decision-making Serving as in-consultant who simplifies complex terminologies into more understandable insights to our internal clients Producing actionable insights that will be used to support or devise new strategies Developing reports and analysis Last but not least, learn and grow alongside Shopee, earn your 'e-commerce degree', and participate in shaping one of Asia's most exciting companies, Shopee! Requirements: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science/ Information Systems or any related field Experience working with one or more language for querying (e.g. SQL) Familiar with advanced analytics languages like Python or R Experience working with multiple stakeholders across various divisions Ability to make inferences from data and devise appropriate course of actions Care about learning new things and challenge the status quo to seek for improvement areas Strong communication skills in English Comfortable working with large data sets and numbers Good working knowledge of the e-commerce market Exceptional interpersonal skills Self-starter with can-do attitude

title: Business Intelligence - GoPay
description: Location Jakarta Work Type Permanent Application Posted May 12, 2022 About the Role   As a Business Intelligence Analyst, you will be working with the Business and product team on supporting analytics and data products (automated dashboards, reports, alerts, and simulation tools) which will create business impact at scale! You would be helping GoPay at a level of detail that enables the stakeholders to identify and address critical issues and align deliverables according to the Team’s priorities and requirements. What You Will Do Data ETL (Extraction, Transform, and Load) Create dashboards, automation, and reports Event performance analysis (cashback, promos, POI, etc) Provide visualizations to track GoPay performance General analysis of each new feature/product that has been released and to is released What You Will Need Bachelor's degree in computer science/information science, engineering, statistics, business, management, accounting, and other related fields At least 3 years of experience in analyst or business intelligence field Familiarity with all variants of SQL Proficient in ETL (extract, transform, load) Familiarity with Metabase, Tableau, and Bigquery will be a major plus Excellent analytical skills topped with strong communication, stakeholder management, and presentation capabilities in order to share recommendations Strong contribution to database design and data architecture, data mining and analytics, data security and privacy, and data visualization About the Team Our team likes to see ourselves as what blood is to the brain - constantly supplying the brain with oxygen so it can function properly. Our super team of 11 BI analysts supplies data and insights that fuel GoPay's innovations and evolutions. How does one achieve this, you may ask? Through our data products (automated dashboards, reports, alerts, and simulation tools) and continuous collaboration with the folks in the business and product teams. We are in charge of creating foundational customer segmentation, designing automation processes for campaign tracking, and providing regular reports to the leadership team. Anything data-related within the growth, digital inclusion, or risk and fraud for GoPay is what our team is concerned about✌ We oversee all things to give stakeholders valuable insights into decision making and actively growing to be a world-class team that can be the consultant to the business with complete skill sets in technical and business aspects. It's our job to ensure that GoPay runs seamlessly. One of the biggest challenges we had to face is to make all our works to be fully-automated which can reduce the number of manual work of doing data requests. We eventually resolved it by creating several automation tools and enhancing our workflow and procedures with the help of good project management planning. Currently, we're busy at work on various projects, including one about helping the company to reach its north star metrics by using our data products Before the pandemic, as a team, we used to have monthly outings/dinners. During the pandemic, we rarely meet each other offline but thank goodness for the invention of Slack and Zoom calls that keep us feeling close. Hopefully, we will have a regular monthly fun time again as the number of cases keeps decreasing. About Gojek Gojek is a Super App. It is one app for ordering food, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, and a dozen other products. We are Indonesia’s first decacorn. We are also the only Southeast Asian startup to be part of Fortune's list of 'Companies That Changed The World.' Our Mission: To create and scale positive socio-economic impact for our customers, driver-partners, business, and MSMEs. As of 2018, Gojek processed more than $9 billion in annualized gross transaction value across all markets where it operates - in Singapore, Vietnam, and Indonesia. We have the largest food delivery product in Asia (outside of China) and is the largest payments wallet in Southeast Asia. Gojek contributed IDR 249 T to the Indonesian economy (equivalent to 2% of Indonesia's GDP in 2020). As of Q1 2021, the Gojek App witnessed over 190mn downloads by customers. The platform has over 2mn Driver Partners & ~900000 Merchant Partners across SEA. About GoTo Financial GoTo Financial brings secure, reliable, and user-friendly financial solutions to over 55 million monthly active users, more than 14 million merchants, and over 2.5 million driver-partners eager to benefit from the digital economy in the GoTo ecosystem. GoTo Financial’s consumer services include GoPay, GoPayLater, and other financial services. We also serve businesses of all sizes through leading payment gateway Midtrans, Indonesia’s largest cloud POS network Moka and GoKasir. We also have the all-in-one merchant solution GoBiz, GoBiz Plus, GoStore, and Selly - available in Indonesia and Southeast Asia. Gojek and GoTo Financial are committed to building a diverse and inclusive workplace and are equal opportunity employers. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, national origin, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, disability, age, education status, or any other legally protected status.

title: People - Recruitment Lead, Business Intelligence & Engineering
description: DepartmentPeople LevelExperienced (Team Lead) LocationIndonesia - Jakarta The People team plays a crucial organisational role in Shopee by channeling important resources to key functions in the company — from hiring the right talents, to developing employee-focused learning initiatives, and building a supportive environment for our employees to thrive in. At the core of Shopee’s success lies the talent and dedication of our employees. As our business expands, so does the need to grow with our employees. Browse our People team openings to see how you can make an impact with us. Job Description: Provide leadership, support, advocacy and vision to the technical recruiters and support staff who provide recruiting support to hiring managers across related functions including BI and Engineering Department Collaborate with hiring managers in understanding the needs and roles to be filled as well as review job descriptions for vacancies Manage the recruiting pipeline including determining resources status and needs, coordinating recruiting events and sourcing activities, assessing, and managing referral processes Build the talent pool to manage the hiring cycle and develop new strategies and programs to attract candidates Create, build, and maintain networks of potential passive candidates to fill future anticipated and planned roles Define the most effective methods for recruiting and attracting candidates especially for Tech talents Identify appropriate candidates and assess their qualifications through review of their resumes, interviews, and other forms of communications Formulate and implement other HR initiatives and projects when necessary Oversees the daily workflow of the department Provides constructive and timely performance evaluations  Requirements: Proven work experience as a Technical Recruiter with 7+ years hands-on experience Minimum 3 years experience in people management or lead a team Proven and experienced as a articulate recruitment consultant / headhunter (will be a plus point) Thorough understanding of recruiting methods and best practices, as well as applicable policies and federal, state, and local employment laws and regulations Thorough understanding of technology, technical roles and technical skills Technical expertise with an ability to understand and explain job requirements for IT roles Someone that understand and have experiences in full-cycle recruiting and employer branding initiatives Fast learner in understanding the duties and competencies of different roles Experience with great project management skills & strong communication skills to build relationships with various hiring managers Strong supervisory and leadership skills Ability to prioritize tasks and to delegate them when appropriate Ability to function well in a high-paced environment

The team analyses and monitors operational KPIs across the region and conducts root cause analysis when operation performance fluctuates. The Operations team comprises Customer Service, Payment, Listings, Warehouse, Logistics, Seller Operations and Fraud. Browse our Operations team openings to see how you can make an impact with us. title: Business Intelligence Specialist-Indonesia
description: Location: Indonesia Department: Data & Business Intelligence Location: Indonesia Job Description As a fast-growing e-commerce platform, Lazada Indonesia needs strong business intelligence specialists who can help business units use real-time information to make the right decisions.   Utilize company resources to curate and prepare data for analysis and use Collaborate with stakeholders to accurately understand their business intelligence requirements Develop reporting tools and dashboards Analyse data for trends and patterns, then produce and surface insights to key stakeholders Coordinate with technology departments to design and implement new dashboards, and/or produce deep-dive analysis that will produce business impact Job Requirements Advanced degree (Bachelor minimum) 4+ years in an analytical position (business intelligence, MIS or analytics) Familiarity with BI tools and languages, with SQL and Excel being compulsory Willingness to learn and use new business intelligence tools (i.e. Alibaba’s platforms) Able to work with stakeholders with no background knowledge in business intelligence Capable of prioritizing multiple projects to meet deadlines Excellent analytical capabilities Very high attention to detail when it comes to data quality Strong interest in being a business intelligence specialist Very high inherent levels of curiosity Very high degree of positivity when faced with significant challenges Preferably strong written and verbal communication skills Preferably a high degree of ownership towards quality of own work

title: Business Intelligence Analyst
description: Flash Coffee is one of the fastest growing tech-enabled coffee chains in Asia, backed by Rocket Internet, White Star Capital, Delivery Hero-backed DX Ventures, Global Founders Capital, and Conny & Co. We blend an award-winning coffee menu, curated by World Latte Art Champion Arnon Thitiprasert and Indonesian Latte Art Champion Robby Firlian at affordable prices to make great coffee accessible to all. Currently operating in Singapore, Jakarta, Bangkok, Taiwan, Hong Kong, Seoul and Tokyo, Flash Coffee will be opening its doors in other APAC capitals this year, offering an unparalleled customer experience that's powered by technology. What you'll do: Define and implement BI & analytics strategies, dashboards, and reports, enabling Flash Coffee to uncover actionable insights and opportunities from our existing data. title: Business Intelligence and Analytics Lead
description: Are you that person who loves building and maintaining optimized highly available data pipelines that facilitate deeper analysis? At Tokenomy we believe Blockchain and Cryptocurrency technologies will form a big part of the future of Finance. You will be responsible for the design and maintenance of the business’ data platform. If you’re excited about a business' growing database, we should talk. Responsibilities : Data management Partner closely with engineering to shape the strategy for building out our growing data set and ETL pipelines. Design and develop data ETL routines to integrate data from disparate source systems into an integrated business intelligence environment including defining source-to-target mappings, business rules and other required data transformations. Establish and maintain tracking of key business metrics, identifying trends/changes and driving improvement this includes designing and implementing reports for the consumption of business stakeholders. Develop dashboards and reports using BI reporting tools like Microsoft Power BI, Tableau, Looker, Data Studio and data warehouses (AWS, snowflake, etc.). Develop ad hoc analysis/data mining tasks and reporting as needed. Communication Implement and educate stakeholders on data governance policies and best practices. Guide the team on how to build and maintain dashboards to track product usage and performance. You must be able to grow others to provide meaningful insights through data manipulation and interpretation skills; be able to quantitatively assess business problems and questions. Present insights to a non-technical audience; communicate findings clearly and concisely through narrative-driven presentations and data visualizations. Work cross-functionally to ensure that data-driven decisions are driving the whole organization forward. Balances a variety of competing goals in a design, including project time, scope and budget constraints, and system performance, message verbosity, and loose coupling. Experience: Comprehensive data analysis and design experience, with full knowledge of data warehouse and data mart methodologies as well analysis modeling. Significant experience in the architecture, design and development of data integration solutions and data analysis. Experience setting up and managing Power BI Report server is a plus. Ability to work independently in a fast paced environment with minimum oversight. You would own building a future proof integration architecture to solve integration needs across projects. Ability to write complex SQL queries in support of ETL processes or BI reporting. Interested for The Role?   Don’t forget to attach your Resume/CV and GitHub link if you have one!

title: Cocoa Life Coordinator
description: Job Description Are You Ready to Make It Happen at Mondelēz International? Join our Mission to Lead the Future of Snacking. Make It Matter. You are part of a team in India responsible for building sustainable cocoa sourcing strategies to meet Cocoa-Life objectives on best practices in sustainable cocoa farming, improving livelihoods in cocoa communities, protecting the forest and the environment, and building and maintaining Mondelēz International’s reputation. How you will contribute You will be responsible for the day-to-day management of the nursery, ensuring that processes are strictly followed and that the Cocoa nursery is well-tended and respected. To help with benchmarking and performance improvement, you will closely track KPIs and regularly report on their progress. You will also conduct education in the field about cocoa, including educating others about how cocoa is grown, why cocoa should be planted, good agricultural practices (GAP), and how to implement sustainability initiatives (e.g. training women, drip irrigation and supporting marginal farmers). In addition, you will: Work with government officials in horticulture and agriculture departments to implement cocoa programs. Collect data for crop forecasting and market intelligence for pricing decisions. Work with third-party operations for cocoa procurement and processing. What you will bring A desire to drive your future and accelerate your career with experience and knowledge in: Strong analytics and process discipline Hands-on knowledge of agriculture with a commercial orientation Communication, with strong interpersonal and influencing skills Ability to work alone and independently without direct supervision More about this role What you need to know about this position: Position is part of Cocoa Life Indonesia team and based in Lampung, Sumatera . The role is responsibility for day to day operation of Cocoa Life Program in Lampung and West Sumatera , ensuring the project specification and process/procedure are strictly follow and respected. in addition , you will : manage Sumatera program partners, facilitate dialogue and information flow between all partners, building strong relationship with local key governments, contribute to Continues Improvement (CIGS), provide implementation recommendation for improvement, actively represent MDLZ Cocoa Life Indonesia in Lampung. What extra ingredients you will bring: Education / Certifications: Bachelor of agriculture or Forestry or Sustainability Job specific requirements: Minimum 3 years experience on agriculture or forests sustainability Good knowledge and practical experience of agricultural value chain or sustainable agriculture with commercial orientation, ideally on agriculture commodity Proven ability to engage effectively and influence key stakeholders have knowledge on social development, human rights and environmental sustainability broadly Travel requirements: 70% of time travel in cocoa area in Lampung and West Sumatera and few domestic travel within Indonesia Work schedule: No Relocation support available Business Unit Summary Mondelēz International in Southeast Asia is in five countries serving 19 markets with more than 18 nationalities and 7,500 employees. This group is emerging as one of the fastest growing regions in Asia, the Middle East and Africa, and we are proud of consistently producing high quality products in nine manufacturing sites. We are market leaders in key snacking categories, making and selling brands like Oreo and Tiger biscuits, Kinh Do mooncakes, Jacob’s crackers, Cadbury Dairy Milk chocolate, Tang powdered beverage, Halls candy and Eden cheese. We set the benchmark in being a responsible business and contributing to the communities in which we operate. Mondelēz International is an equal opportunity employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation or preference, gender identity, national origin, disability status, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. Job Type Regular Sustainability, Well Being & Social Impact Corporate & Government Affairs
